title: Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 8 HT-A8000 - Home Theater Sound System with with 11 Speakers, Innovative Acoustic Design, and 360 Spatial Sound Mapping, Theater Bar 8 Soundbar
inStockText: Only 18 left in stock - order soon.  Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Transform your TV sound system with the Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 8 Soundbar and experience the magic of cinema at home. This surround sound system for TV is designed to unlock the full potential of sound, wrapping you in a 360 Spatial Sound Mapping, delivering every intricate sound detail as the creator intended. The Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 8 Soundbar is more than just a soundbar for TV, it's a smart soundbar. This sound bar for smart TV auto-tunes the sound to your room’s characteristics with Sound Field Optimization, delivering room optimized sound that enhances your audio experience by adjusting to your room's acoustics. Where innovation meets design, you'll find the Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 8 Soundbar, a sound bar that redefines your audio experience. As part of your home theater systems, it delivers exceptional acoustic performance and precise room filling spatial audio, ensuring every corner of your room is filled with rich, detailed sound. Designed to be the perfect companion for your BRAVIA TV, the Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 8 Soundbar can be controlled from the TV menu. When paired with compatible BRAVIA TV models, this seamless integration and control enhances your overall entertainment experience with Acoustic Center Sync, providing elevated audio. Enjoy music from all corners of the world with the Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 8 Soundbar. Supporting wireless streaming with Spotify Connect, Apple AirPlay 2 and Bluetooth, it allows you to enjoy your favorite music from various sources for a versatile and convenient listening experience.
features: SPATIAL SOUND: Experience the magic of 360 Spatial Sound Mapping with this tv sound system from Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 8 Soundbar. This surround sound system for tv engulfs you in cinema-like sound from all directions, transporting you right into the heart of the action.

AUTO CALIBRATION: Dream no more about auto calibration with the Sound Field Optimization feature of this soundbar for tv. This sound bar for smart tv ensures a crystal clear, room-filling sound that's perfectly balanced, making every movie night or music session a memorable event.

IMMERSIVE FORMATS: This sound bar brings the cinema sound home with support for industry-standard formats like Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, and IMAX Enhanced. Known for their exceptional clarity, depth, and detail, these home theater systems provide a truly immersive audio experience.

ACOUSTIC DESIGN: Discover the innovative acoustic design of the Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 8 Soundbar. With 11 speaker units working together, it delivers exceptional acoustic performance and precise room-filling spatial audio.

EXPANDABLE AUDIO: Expand your audio experience with the optional wireless subwoofer (SA-SW3 or SA-SW5) and rear speakers (SA-RS3S or SA-RS5). These additions enhance the depth and dimension of your audio, creating a more immersive and cinematic experience.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
BRAVIA Theater Bar 8 
Movie theater surround sound at home 
Sound bar with 11 speakers and Dolby Atmos/DTS:X 
Cinema is coming home 
Feel the emotion and excitement of the movies with BRAVIA Theater. Our decades of professional filmmaking experience allow us to faithfully recreate the creators vision at home with intricate surround sound and spatial audio. 
Unleash the full potential of surround sound 
360 Spatial Sound Mapping creates multiple phantom speakers around you and reflects sound off the ceiling and walls, enabling cinema-style surround sound from a single soundbar. Add optional wireless rear speakers for an even more expansive sound stage. 
Room optimized sound 
Turn the whole room into a movie theater. Sound Field Optimization analyzes and calibrates sound to your room’s size, acoustic characteristics, and your listening position. 
Sound straight from cinema 
Bring authentic cinema surround sound quality to your living room. BRAVIA Theatre supports industry-standard formats including Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, and IMAX Enhanced certification. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Innovative acoustic design 
With 11 speaker units, BRAVIA Theater Bar 8 delivers exceptional acoustic performance. Hear precise spatial audio with dedicated front, center, and up-firing speaker channels. 
Expand your surround sound 
Expand the cinematic experience with optional wireless subwoofer (SA-SW3 or SA-SW5) and rear speakers (SA-RS3R or SA-RS5) to hear sound with even greater impact. Connection is simplified as the subwoofer and rear speakers automatically pair when powered on. Subwoofers and speakers sold separately. 
BRAVIA Theater and BRAVIA TV 
Pair with BRAVIA TV for a cinema-like experience. Hear people’s voices clearly with Voice Zoom 3 when connected with compatible BRAVIA TV. 
Easy UI and setup 
Use BRAVIA Connect app to easily control BRAVIA Theater from your smartphone and change volume, sound profiles, and advanced settings. 
High-Resolution Audio 
Get the most out of all your entertainment. Supports video formats 4K HDR, 8K HDR, Dolby Vision and HDMI 2.1 gaming features 4K120, VRR, ALLM. 
Stream music from everywhere 
Support for Spotify Connect, Apple AirPlay 2 and Bluetooth lets you wirelessly stream music and enjoy every detail in high-quality upmixed sound.

title: ULTIMEA 5.1 Sound Bar with Virtual Surround Sound System for TV, Sound Bar for Smart TV with 2 Surround Speakers for Home Theater, App Control, Wired Subwoofer, Peak Power 250W, Opt/AUX/BT, Aura A30
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: 5.1ch Virtual Surround Sound System for TV: This 5.1 sound bar for smart tv features 3 main channels for crystal-clear dialogue, along with 2 surround speakers that create a virtual surround sound field. Utilizing SurroundX technology, it provides highly detailed audio with 99.99% accuracy. AI enhances sound quality for a realistic audio by coordinating speakers to simulate authentic sound movement. Note: Recommended for space of 108 to 215 ft².

Wired Connection between 2 Surround Speakers: Use a cable to connect 2 surround speakers, then power the right speaker to establish a wireless link with the tv sound bar. If pairing fails, ensure the soundbar and 2 speakers are within 1.5 ft of each other. Hold the SURROUND button on the remote for 5s until “SUR” flashes. Then press the PAIR button on the right speaker for 5s until its light flashes. Once paired, the light will remain on. You can adjust the speaker positions as needed.

4-inch Wired Subwoofer with BassMX Technology: The Aura A30 sound bar for tv comes with a wired subwoofer equipped with Ultimea BassMX technology, enhancing low-frequency audio. Its advanced magnetic circuit and diaphragm deliver powerful, resonant bass, immersing you in rich sound textures. With BassMX, action scenes and explosions are amplified, elevating your overall audio experience and ensuring you feel every beat.

Ultimea Smart App Control for Intuitive Audio Adjustments: Ultimea smart App for this 5.1 tv sound bar for smart tv can switch multiple EQ, adjust bands and matrix, lets you fine-tune the treble, midrange, and bass tones to perfectly suit your personal preferences. Stay ahead with regular OTA upgrades to ensure a seamless premium audio experience with Ulitmea 5.1 virtual surround sound system for tv.

121 Preset EQ Matrices: The Ultimea App caters to the ultimate audio enthusiast with 121 preset equalizer matrices, tailored for four distinct sonic preferences: Bass, Pop, Classical, and Rock. Explore precision tuning and fine-tune your listening experience with dynamic adjustments to achieve your desired effects.

10-Band Equalizer Settings: Elevate your audio experience with 6 tailored EQ modes: Movie, Music, Voice, Sport, Game, and Night, each finely tuned for optimal performance. Further refine your listening with the Ultimea App's advanced "Customize", allowing you to dial in the perfect personalized sound to match your preferences and environment.

title: Sony HT-S400 2.1ch Soundbar with Powerful Wireless subwoofer, S-Force PRO Front Surround Sound, and Dolby Digital, Black
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Enjoy rich surround sound with clear dialogue with the HT-S400 2.1ch Soundbar. A wireless subwoofer and HDMI ARC5 one-cable connection make watching movies and TV more immersive. Deeper, more engaging bass performance in music, movies and gaming make it perfect for the essential home theater.
features: IMMERSIVE SURROUND SOUND: S-Force PRO Front Surround and Dolby Digital create cinematic style surround sound.
ENJOY CLEAR DIALOGUE AND POWERFUL SOUND: Powerful audio technology, such as the X-Balanced Speaker Unit and Separated Notch Edge, works to deliver wide-ranging sound and enhanced vocal clarity.
SIMPLE & EASY OPERATION: The simple, compact remote control and convenient OLED display window make operation a breeze.
WIRELESS SUBWOOFER INCLUDED: A powerful wireless subwoofer with a large 160mm speaker unit delivers a deeper, richer bass sound.
EASY WIRELESS CONNECTION: Flexible layout and wireless connection to compatible BRAVIA TVs minimizes cable clutter.
WALL-MOUNTABLE WITH A FLUSH FIT: Designed to blend seamlessly into your living room, the wall-mountable soundbar has a flat back that fits perfectly flush to the wall.
EFFORTLESS CONTROL WITH BRAVIA TVs: With an integrated UI, soundbar settings automatically appear on the BRAVIA TVs Quick Settings menu for easy control of sound settings and volume.
MUSIC PLAYBACK: Easily play your favorite music through your soundbar too. Use Bluetooth technology to wirelessly stream music from your smartphone, tablet or laptop.
SET UP IN SECONDS: Connect to your TV with either HDMI ARC or optical connection.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
HT-S400 
Rich surround sound for all your content 
2.1ch Sound bar with powerful wireless subwoofer 
S-Force PRO Front Surround and Dolby Digital 
The sound bar couples high-quality Dolby Digital with S-Force PRO Front Surround – our virtual surround sound technology –putting you right at the heart of the content you love by emulating cinema style surround sound. 
2.1ch front surround sound with X-Balanced speaker 
Powerful speakers work together to deliver wide-ranging sound throughout your room, with technologies such as the X-Balanced Speaker Unit and Separated Notch Edge helping to enhance vocal clarity. You won’t miss a word of dialogue in your favorite movies and TV shows. 
Simple and easy operation 
A simple new remote control combines a comfortable hand-fit design with easy and intuitive operation. An OLED display window on the sound bar offers at-a-glance status information such as input source, volume, and sound settings such as Sound Field, Voice mode and Night mode. 
Wall-mountable design with a flush fit 
Designed to blend seamlessly into your living room, the wall-mountable HT-S400 sound bar has a flat back that fits perfectly flush to the wall. 
Wireless subwoofer 
A powerful wireless subwoofer with a large 160mm speaker unit delivers a deeper, richer bass sound.

Bluetooth connectivity 
Easily play your favorite music through your sound bar too. Use Bluetooth to wirelessly stream music from your smartphone, tablet, or laptop. 
Set up in seconds 
With a choice of HDMI ARC and optical input, it’s easy to connect to a range of TVs – so you can get on with enjoying your movie, music, and more.

title: ULTIMEA 4.1ch Sound Bar for Smart TV with Subwoofer, Peak Power 200W, 2-in-1 Detachable Bluetooth 5.3 Soundbar, Bass Adjustable, 3 EQ Modes TV Sound Bar, ARC/Optical/Aux, Apollo S50 Detachable Series
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: Versatile and Space-Saving Shape - The soundbar's detachable design allows you to assemble it in a variety of styles to fit the layout and atmosphere of your room. The split design saves space while the unique 7° tilt design enriches the soundstage with exclusive details.

Wired Subwoofer with Enhanced Bass - Featuring built-in 2 tweeters and woofers, this 4.1ch soundbar for TV reproduces a balanced sound enjoys richer lows, and indulges in crisper highs. Additionally, the Apollo S50 soundbar has an extra 7.2L large-volume wired subwoofer that enables the diaphragm's amplitude to reach 15mm, achieving a more powerful bass.

Personalized Sound Experience - Elevate your audio with 3 EQ modes designed for music, movies, and games. Ultimea exclusive BassMX technology enriches the low frequencies, enabling adjustable bass for a rumble, pulse-pounding Bass. All of these modes are easily accessible with a touch of a button on the EQ settings.
Fuller and Clearer Sound - The soundbar utilizes an upgraded DSP chip to reduce audio static. This ensures that every word and sound is heard exactly as it was intended.

Seamless Connectivity - The soundbar has wired and wireless dual connection options, including ARC, Optical, AUX, and USB ports (all cables included). Bluetooth 5.3 technology ensures faster speeds and a coverage range of up to 49 feet.
Simplified Control - With CEC synchronization, you can control your TV and soundbar simultaneously under an ARC connection. One-click power/volume switching reduces the need for multiple remotes.

Bass will add fullness and increase the sense of presence in films(music, explosions, etc).

Option 1–Two Tower Speakers: Connect both speaker shells with a base from inside the box.
Option 2–A Soundbar: Connect the 2 speaker shells together without using a base.

breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: 【Hearing Every Word】 Say goodbye to muffled dialogue and hello to our soundbar that brings words to life, making you feel like you're part of the conversation.

【Compact yet Suitable】At a little over 2.5 inches in height, our sound bar is compact enough to fit in most spaces. You can easily mount it on the wall or place it in front of your TV without worrying about it blocking the bottom edge or IR remote sensor.

【DSP&Three Sound Effects】With DSP, sound bar offers three sound modes or presets that cater to different program types, such as movies, music, news. These profiles can optimize the audio settings to suit the specific genre, enhancing your listening experience based on your preferences.
【Compatible with Fire TV Remote】Soundbar is compatible with Fire TV remote control. Additional remotes compatible with Roku box or Roku TVs can be provided as per your request.

【Hassle-free Installation】We've made the installation steps for the soundbar much simple. Plus, a special vibrant, easy-to-follow installation instructions has been included in the package. In case you still encounter any issues during the sound bar installation process, our dedicated after-sales team is always available to assist you!

【Your Satisfaction is our top Priority】We proudly offer an extensive worry-free after sale for our soundbar, ensuring your peace of mind for FIVE whole years. Not only that, we also provide free lifetime replacements for accessories including optical cable, AUX cable, wall mount kits, remote, etc. Our dedicated after-sales team is available 24/7 round the clock, to assist you with any product-related concerns.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
RIOWOIS Sound Bar for Smart TV 
RIOWOIS soundbar delivers an audio experience that is nothing short of extraordinary, with every note and beat coming to life in stunning clarity. 
Compact in Size, Strong in Entertainment 
Whether you're watching your favorite movies, enjoying your favorite tunes, or engaging in intense gaming sessions, our soundbar elevates the overall entertainment value, delivering crystal-clear dialogue, immersive surround sound, and deep, rich bass. 
Three Sound Effects 
Three different sound effects are available to enhance your TV viewing experience. 
ABS Material+Frosted Finish 
ABS material and frosted finishes offer durable and elegant benefits for soundbars. ABS is lightweight and long-lasting, while the frosted finish diffuses light, reduces glare, and minimizes fingerprints, creating a visually appealing and sleek soundbar experience. 
More than Just for TV 
Sound bar offers multiple connectivity options including AUX, optical, and Bluetooth. It can be easily connected to various streaming devices such as TVs, computers, projectors, cell phones, and tablets, etc. 
Twin-magnet Driver 
Twin-magnet driver provides greater control over the cone movement with improved bass response and overall sound quality.
Remote Control 
Sound bar is compatible with Fire TV remotes.
Additional remotes compatible with Roku box or Roku TVs can be provided as per your request.
Active Subwoofer Compatible 
Sound bar enhances bass by connecting an active subwoofer. 
Caution! Soundbar is not compatible with passive subwoofers.
Exclusive Bass Reflex Port 
Exclusive Bass Reflex Port enhances low-frequency response, producing deeper bass tones with less distortion and noise.

title: Introducing Amazon Fire TV Soundbar Plus with subwoofer, 3.1 channel, Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, clear dialogue, 2024 release
inStockText: In Stock
features: Fire TV Soundbar Plus with subwoofer – Heighten sound and your senses with a 3.1 soundbar and bass you can feel. Featuring crisp dialogue, Dolby Atmos, and DTS:X.
Bass that’s built to thrill – Combine your soundbar with a powerful subwoofer for bass that puts you in the middle of the action.
Crystal clear dialogue – A dedicated center dialogue channel sharpens conversations so you can catch every moment of your favorite shows.
Sound in another dimension – Dolby Atmos features 3D sound that moves around you and clear dialogue. DTS:X delivers multi-dimensional audio for lifelike sound.
Easy setup – After you plug in your subwoofer to power, it connects to your soundbar and fills the room with bold bass.
Tuned into your content – Movie, Music, Sports, and Night modes optimize audio based on what you’re watching.
Fire TV ready – Use one remote to control your TV and soundbar. And customize your sound in the Fire TV audio settings (select models apply).
Stream audio with Bluetooth – Connect your phone or tablet via Bluetooth to listen to your top playlists.
Compatible with your TV – Works with smart TVs and TVs connected to streaming media players.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers appreciate the sound quality, ease of setup, and functionality of the product. They find it easy to connect and integrate with their devices like TVs and Fire TV sticks. Many appreciate the clear voice and rich audio quality, mentioning that the bass is great without the subwoofer. The connectivity and control panel are also appreciated. However, some customers mention that the size is large, so it's important to take measurements before ordering.

description: Meet the top-of-the-line Bose Smart Ultra Soundbar that’s here to pull you deep into the heart of all your favorite content. This surround sound system for TV is equipped with Dolby Atmos, which separates music, dialogue, and effects, and places them in different parts of a room for a truly immersive spatial audio experience like you’ve never heard it before. And for content that hasn’t been created in Dolby Atmos, TrueSpace technology works its magic to make your content feel like it’s coming from all around you. Even old school movies, tv shows, and games sound new again with this Bluetooth soundbar for TV. Having a hard time hearing what your favorite characters are saying? A.I. Dialogue Mode balances voice and surround sound for ultra-crisp vocal clarity. With six full-range transducers, including two custom-engineered upward firing dipole speakers, you’ll feel like your space is filled with sound from every direction, even overhead, with this TV speaker. But it’s not just the sound quality you’ll love. Premium materials. Solid construction. Refined finishes. Clever controls. All carefully considered to create a Dolby Atmos soundbar surround sound system that looks as beautiful as it sounds. Amazon Alexa is built in, so just say the word. Or connect the Bluetooth soundbar to a compatible Google device so you can control your content just using your voice. Connect to your TV with either included cable, an optical audio cable or an HDMI eARC cable. Use Bose SimpleSync to connect with different Bose headphones and select Bose Bluetooth speakers.

title: HumanCentric Wall Mount Compatible with Sonos Arc and Sonos Arc Ultra Sound Bar (Black), Mounting Bracket Compatible with Sonos Arc Wall Mount, Soundbar Mount for Sonos Arc Mount on Wall Under TV
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Accessories & Supplies › Mounts › Speaker Mounts
features: Wall mount compatible with Sonos Arc and Sonos Arc Ultra soundbar: Mounting bracket includes all hardware to mount your Sonos Arc on the wall. The wall mount bracket is compatible with the black or white Arc. Not compatible with any other soundbars.

Hidden design: This HumanCentric wall mount does not have unsightly metal struts. Your Sonos Arc wall mount almost completely hides behind your soundbar for a minimalist and clean look. After installation, you'll have a floating style Sonos soundbar mount.

Smart EQ optimization: The regular Arc is able to detect when it is attached to this mount to adjust the EQ for optimal quality by tempering the bass resonance from the wall. The screws also will not vibrate when the soundbar is playing.

Important mounting note: For best sound quality, mount the Sonos wall mount Arc four inches from the bottom of the TV. Unlike other compatible Sonos Arc TV mount brackets, the installation does not require you to attach or hang anything from your TV.

Important mounting note: Be sure to tighten the screws all the way until the entire thread portion is in the hole and they can't be tightened anymore. The anti-vibration locker patch on the screw threads causes them to have a little more resistance when tightening.

title: Bose TV Speaker - Soundbar for TV with Bluetooth and HDMI-ARC Connectivity, Black, Includes Remote Control
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: The Bose TV Speaker helps you hear your TV better. It’s a small sound bar that clarifies speech and improves overall TV sound. Inside the TV speaker there are two full-range drivers angled to deliver wide, spacious sound and a center tweeter specifically focused on elevating vocals. Built-in Dolby decoding helps further enhance this compact TV speaker’s audio capabilities to deliver a more realistic and satisfying listening experience. Designed with simplicity in mind, this small soundbar only uses a single connection to the TV via an optical audio cable (included) or an HDMI cable (sold separately) and has you up and running in minutes. At just over 2" tall, the Bose TV Speaker is a compact sound bar that can be placed just about anywhere. And small LED lights on the front of this small soundbar turn on and/or change color for visual confirmation when certain features are enabled. They also blink in acknowledgement of volume changes. The Bose TV Speaker has HDMI-CEC, which allows the TV and this small soundbar to communicate when connected with an HDMI cable. Meaning when you turn the TV on, the TV speaker will automatically turn on too. With this technology, you can even keep using your current TV remote to control the volume of this compact soundbar. However, the Bose TV Speaker comes with its own remote. And on it, you can enable “dialogue mode” on the TV speaker to elevate vocals even more or press the “bass” button for some extra depth. This compact soundbar also is a Bluetooth soundbar. Simply press the Bluetooth button on the remote to pair your device to this Bluetooth TV speaker and wirelessly stream your favorite music or podcasts. You can also expand your system at any time by adding a wired subwoofer to the Bluetooth TV speaker for a more home-theater-like experience. The Bose TV Speaker is compatible with the Bose Bass Module 500 and 700 and requires the Bose Bass Module Connection Cable or a standard 3.5 mm audio cable, sold separately.
features: Hear your TV better: Designed with simplicity in mind, the Bose TV Speaker is a small soundbar that clarifies speech and is a simple fix for better TV sound
Wide, natural sound: 2 angled full-range drivers deliver a more realistic, spatial audio experience for overall better TV sound from a small soundbar
Enhanced dialogue: This TV speaker is designed to specifically focus on clarifying and elevating vocals and pronunciation

Bluetooth TV Speaker: Pair your device to this Bluetooth soundbar to wirelessly stream your favorite music and podcasts. Connect up to 3 devices through the inputs (HDMI, Optical in, and AUX in); the first powered on device will automatically connect
Simple setup: A single connection from this compact soundbar to the TV via an optical audio cable (included) or an HDMI cable (sold separately) has you up and running in minutes

Compact soundbar: This small soundbar is just over 2" tall for easy placement in front of your TV or mounted to a wall (wall brackets sold separately). Overall TV speaker dimensions are 2.21" H x 23.38" W x 4.02" D.
Remote control: Compact TV speaker comes with a remote control that enables a dialogue mode to further enhance speech or add a bass boost for more depth

Build and expand: The Bose TV Speaker is compatible with the Bose Bass Module 500 or 700 and requires the Bose Bass Module Connection Cable or a standard 3.5 millimeter audio cable, sold separately. Power cord:5 ft

title: Amazon Fire TV Soundbar, 2.0 speaker with DTS Virtual:X and Dolby Audio, Bluetooth connectivity
inStockText: In Stock
features: Amp up your audio - Fire TV Soundbar enhances TV audio with dual speakers for fuller sound, clearer dialogue, and deeper bass—all in a compact design.
Immersive sound - Enjoy a three-dimensional virtual surround sound experience with DTS Virtual:X and more detail with Dolby Audio.

What is the sound quality of the soundbar? 
Our soundbar is designed to deliver high-quality, immersive sound, enhancing your audio experience significantly 
Is the sound bar speaker loud? 
Soundbar has excellent dsp technology to optimize audio output without compromising sound quality. Its compact design also enhances sound dispersion, creating a richer, more powerful audio experience. 
Does this tv speaker soundbar have ARC? 
Yes, it does support ARC. 
Is there 1 soundbar and 2 small speakers in the package? 
There are 2 separated sound bars which could be assembled into 1 soudbar. 
Can I use the bluetooth soundbar with my TV? 
Yes, you can use the soundbar with your TV. It can be also connected to TV using either an ARC or optical cable.

title: ULTIMEA 7.1ch Virtual Surround Sound Bar, Surround Sound System for TV, Sound Bar for Smart TV with 4 Surround Speakers, Peak Power 330W, App Control, TV Soundbar with Subwoofer, Opt/AUX/BT, Aura A40
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: 7.1ch Virtual Surround Sound System for TV: This 7.1ch soundbar for tv features 3 main channels for clear dialogue and 4 surround sound speakers to create a virtual surround sound experience. With SurroundX technology, it provides highly accurate audio with 99.99% detail precision. AI optimizes sound for a realistic audio experience, coordinating the speakers to mimic true sound movement and enhancing your home theater setup.

Wired Connection between 4 Surround Speakers: Connect sound bar to 2 front surround speakers using front surround cables (FR & FL). For 2 rear surround speakers, connect them with rear surround cable, power the rear right speaker to pair it wirelessly with sound bar. If pairing fails, hold the SURROUND button on the remote for 5s until "SUR" flashes. Next, hold the PAIR button on the rear right speaker for 5s until its light starts flashing. Once paired, the light will remain on.

4 Adjustable Surround Speakers: The Aura A40 soundbar for TV comes with 2 wired front surround speakers and 2 wired rear surround speakers, providing accurate sound projection from both directions and enhancing audio depth and immersion. Featuring 13 adjustable surround levels, the rear speakers connect wirelessly to the soundbar, reducing cable clutter and optimizing space usage.

Ultimea Smart App Control for Intuitive Audio Adjustments: Ultimea smart App for this 7.1 tv sound bar for smart tv can switch multiple EQ, adjust bands and matrix, lets you fine-tune the treble, midrange, and bass tones to perfectly suit your personal preferences. Stay ahead with regular OTA upgrades to ensure a seamless premium audio experience with Ulitmea 7.1 virtual surround sound system for tv.

121 Preset EQ Matrices: The Ultimea App caters to the ultimate audio enthusiast with 121 preset equalizer matrices, tailored for four distinct sonic preferences: Bass, Pop, Classical, and Rock. Explore precision tuning and fine-tune your listening experience with dynamic adjustments to achieve your desired effects.

10-Band Equalizer Settings: Elevate your audio experience with 6 tailored EQ modes: Movie, Music, Voice, Sport, Game, and Night, each finely tuned for optimal performance. Further refine your listening with the Ultimea App's advanced "Customize", allowing you to dial in the perfect personalized sound to match your preferences and environment.

title: VIZIO Elevate Sound Bar for TV, Home Theater Surround Sound System for TV with Subwoofer and Bluetooth, P514a-H6 5.1.4
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Feel every word, every moment, every emotion, elevated. The new VIZIO Elevate 5.1.4 Home Theater Sound Bar with Dolby Atmos and DTS:X plus 18 total speakers with separate tweeters and dual woofers to breathe thrilling life into the latest movies, sports, gaming, and more. Revolutionary auto-rotating Adaptive Height Speakers blast sound off the ceiling, delivering completely immersive overhead surround sound. When rotated forward, these speakers provide a wider soundstage and clearer vocals to standard surround and stereo modes, particularly great for music. Voice Assistant Input lets you use the voice-enabled device you’re already accustomed to (sold separately) right through the sound bar, in addition to convenient Chromecast built-in and Bluetooth streaming. Three HDMI ports connect two 4K devices to the TV with eARC making setup clean and simple.
features: America's #1 Sound Bar* VIZIO has been filling homes with truly immersive audio for over 10 years, and our sound bars just keep getting better. We are proud to provide our customers with top-tier audio products that bring movies, shows, podcasts, music, and more to life like never before.
18 high-performance speakers for unrivaled cinema-quality.
Adaptive Height Speakers that automatically rotate upwards for Dolby Atmos and DTS:X content and rotates forward for clearer vocals and an ultrawide soundstage.
Dolby Atmos and DTS:X brings cinematic sound around and above you.
4 up-firing speakers that blasts sound off your ceiling and overheard
107dB sound pressure level and 30Hz – 20KHz frequency range that delivers dynamic and accurate sound.

items.text: Receive the latest product updates and adjust advanced soundbar settings by downloading the VIZIO mobile app for your Android or iOS device (A VIZIO Account is required.)

items.title: Low profile
items.text: Our minimalist design creates a silhouette that fits perfectly under your TV for an unobstructed view.

image.name: VIZIO Smart TVs and VIZIO Soundbars

items.title: Modern-line design

modules.title: QuickFit: Our seamless mounting solution.

modules.title: Attach this soundbar to select VIZIO TVs in 3 simple steps. No tools required.

items.title: Twist in
items.text: Simply twist the included thumbscrews into the bottom of compatible VIZIO TVs, no tools needed.

items.title: Plug in
items.text: Connect the soundbar to the TV using HDMI eARC and plug in the power cord for our simplest setup ever.

items.title: Snap on
items.text: Flip your VIZIO soundbar upside down, align insertion points with the TV's thumbscrews, and smoothly slide it into place until you feel a snap.

items.title: Better together
items.text: Enjoy the perfect home entertainment pairing of VIZIO TVs and Soundbars.

description: The 2-in-1 Roku® Streambar® SE is the easiest way to add big-screen entertainment to any TV—even small or old ones. 4K streaming is a snap with guided setup and lightning-fast apps, and you’ll never miss a great line of dialogue with Enhanced Speech Clarity. Plus, pair your favorite wireless headphones or stream music from your mobile device with Bluetooth. With a massive selection of free, live, and premium TV at your fingertips, it's easier than ever to watch what you love in any space you call home.
features: 4K streaming. Surprisingly big sound. All in one.

No more juggling remotes: Power up your TV, adjust the volume, and control your streaming all with one simple remote.
Bluetooth your way: Pair headphones for quiet streaming or play music through your TV sound system.
Easily expandable: Add rich depth and booming bass with Roku Wireless Bass subwoofer. Not compatible with Roku Wireless Speakers.

Customize your home screen

inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Elevate your home entertainment with the Philips Soundbar 2.0 (B5109). This compact yet powerful soundbar is engineered with top-of-the-line audio technologies, including Dolby Digital Plus and DTS Virtual:X, to provide an immersive sound experience. With Roku TV Ready™ certification, setup is straightforward and control is integrated, simplifying your home audio system. The soundbar supports multiple connections including HDMI ARC, optical, and USB, alongside Bluetooth 5.4 with LE Audio, ensuring you can enjoy excellent sound quality from a variety of sources. Whether you're watching your favorite movies, streaming music, or enhancing your gaming experience, this soundbar adjusts to your needs with customizable sound settings. Designed to blend seamlessly into your home with a sleek, wall-mountable frame, the Philips Soundbar 2.0 enhances every audiovisual experience.
features: ENHANCED TV SOUND: This 2.0-channel, 120W soundbar boosts audio for movies and shows, delivering louder, clearer, and richer sound. Adjust treble and bass via remote to match your mood. Ideal for music and action scenes. Feel laser blasts and crowd roars!

LEVEL UP YOUR TV SOUND: With DTS Virtual, you can enjoy immersive 3D audio, and don't need extra speakers! Activate it via remote or PHILIPS app. Plus, Dolby Digital Plus adds depth, making each scene feel vivid. Get front-row sound for movies and games.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR AUDIO: Use the PHILIPS app or remote to select from four EQ modes (Movie, Music, Voice, Stadium) for tailored entertainment or to enable virtual surround or enhance voices. Night Mode is designed for nighttime viewing.

SIMPLE SETUP & EASY CONTROL: Experience a seamless setup and quick access to sound settings, fully compatible with any Roku TV remote. This soundbar connects via HDMI ARC, enabling control of both your TV and soundbar with just one remote.

MULTIPLE CONNECTION OPTIONS: Pair with your smartphone via Bluetooth 5.4. Connect music sources using Aux-in or USB, or enjoy immersive sound through optical input or HDMI ARC. Experience incredible sound quality with any connection.

MODERN DESIGN: Made with distinctive materials, this soundbar features a sleek, low-profile slanted design. Included wall brackets allow versatile placement—set it on a TV stand, mount on the wall, or position on any flat surface.

title: Bose New Smart Dolby Atmos Soundbar, Bluetooth Soundbar Speaker with Voice Control and Amazon Alexa Built-in, Works with Google Assistant Capabilities, Black
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: When movies, TV, and music are your passion, you don‚Äôt want to just watch. That‚Äôs why there‚Äôs the Bose Smart Dolby Atmos Soundbar with shockingly immersive sound for its size. Featuring Dolby Atmos and proprietary TrueSpace technology, the latest Bose soundbar has the power to make you feel everything you watch. TrueSpace technology intelligently analyzes signals other than Dolby Atmos, like stereo or 5.1, and upmixes them to create an immersive multi-channel sound experience. This bluetooth soundbar speaker separates instruments, dialogue, and effects, by placing them throughout your room, including overhead, for a truly immersive experience. Having a hard time hearing what your favorite characters are saying? A.I. Dialogue Mode balances voice and surround sound for ultra-crisp vocal clarity inside this TV soundbar. The Bose Dolby Atmos Soundbar comes with Alexa built-in and works with Google Assistant capabilities, plus Bose Voice4Video technology lets you control the soundbar, your TV, and cable/satellite box with your voice. Stream content any way you want with Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Apple AirPlay 2, Spotify Connect, and Chromecast built-in. If you can get it on your phone, you can hear it through your Bose smart soundbar. For more music throughout your home, group the Dolby Atmos soundbar with other Wi-Fi-enabled Bose products. Bose SimpleSync technology lets you pair this wireless soundbar with a compatible Bose headphone or Bluetooth speaker for private listening or more sound. Setup is easy with one connection to the TV and step-by-step instructions in the Bose app.
features: TOTAL IMMERSION, FOR EVERYTHING YOU PLAY: The Bose Dolby Atmos Soundbar features shockingly immersive sound for its size and utilizes proprietary TrueSpace technology so you can feel everything you watch

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Experience True 360° Surround and Room-Shaking Bass 
Leading in performance, the Nakamichi Shockwafe Elite 7.2 eARC is optimized to deliver a cinematic 3D surround soundscape with plug-and-play simplicity, transforming your living room into an intense bubble filled with moving audio from all directions. 
Dual 8" Subwoofers: Shockwaves of Deep, Punchy Bass 
Real bass is felt, not heard. Our elevated dual 8” wireless subwoofers features all new high output amplifiers and upgraded drivers that harness immense power. Transform your entire room into a sweet spot filled with pressurizing yet balanced lows, as deep as 25Hz. 
Compelling 360° Surround Directionality 
Experience cinematic, lifelike sound from all directions with Dolby Atmos and DTS:X. Unlike conventional soundbars, our 2-way surround speakers (2nd Gen) combine with the soundbar to transform your room into a large 360° surround sound capsule that transports you into the scene. 
Previous page
Multi-Dimensional Height and Surround Soundscape 
SSE Max is a proprietary technology that delivers enhanced height and surround effects. 
Just Like a Live Performance 
With All Channel Stereo mode, every speaker works in unison to deliver 360° sound from your music. 
Flexible and Adaptable Surround Speaker Setup 
Choose between 2 placement options to optimize your surround and height experience. 
Next page

Future-Proof Connectivity 
HDMI eARC enables the soundbar to receive full quality, lossless audio. With 3 HDMI inputs, you can connect even more devices to your home theater. 
Wireless Audio, Better than CD 
The world’s first soundbar with Qualcomm aptX HD, stream every detail from your favorite tunes wirelessly with Bluetooth 5.0 (Up to 24-bit quality). 
Spellbinding Picture Quality 
Remarkable picture quality meets extraordinary audio performance. Experience ultra vivid colors and contrast with 4K HDR and Dolby Vision pass-through 
2nd Gen Backlit Remote 
Optimize your audio experience with our full-feature 43-key remote. Large color-coded backlit buttons ensure precise control, even in the dark.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
DSP & 3 Customized Sounds: The soundbar for TV is built-in DSP technology, provide 3 different sound effect modes (Movie, Music, Dialog)! 
Remote and Button Control 
There are two ways to control the soundbar. Remote control allows you controlling the soundbar while sitting on the sofa which is very convenient. 
Aim the sensor when using remote. 
Remote distance is effective within 5M.
Saiyin soundbars compatible with Fire TV remote.Additional remotes compatible with Roku box or Roku TVs can be provided as per your request.
Fits Multiple TV Sizes 
This soundbar is most suitable for screen sizes of 42 inches and under,perfect for small living rooms. 
LED Indicator Light 
Different colors of the indicator light shows different the mode of the soundbar,so you can quickly switch between different modes. 
AUX (Green LED)
Bluetooth (Blue LED)
Optical (Purple LED)
Standby (Red LED)
User Tips 
For Optical(SPDIF)connection,please change your TV audio output to optical, and change the audio format setting to PCM and make sure the protective caps at the ends of the optical cable are removed before plugging it in.
Sound bars for TV does not support Dolby Sound and DTS, please kindly disable Dolby and DTS on your TV, Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube, and other streaming video apps.
Soundbar does not have USB interface, the soundbar can be connected to your computer through the AUX interface. The AUX port cannot be used as a headphone jack.
Frequently Asked Questions 
Q: When I use APPs such as Netflix on the TV, the soundbar has no sound.
A: The soundbar does not support Dolby and DTS, please kindly disable the Dolby and DTS on your TV audio settings or streaming video APPs like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube. 
Q: How to quickly disconnect the current Bluetooth device connected with Soundbar?
A: Press and hold the BT button on remote /M button on soundbar for about 2 seconds to disconnect the current Bluetooth device. 
Q: My dog chewed my remote, how do l get a replacement remote?
A: We provide replacement soundbar accessories, including remotes. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

I only receive 2 small speakers, is the real soundbar missing? 
No. Those 2 small "speakers" as you mentioned are actually 2 soundbars, which could be combined into 1 large soundbar or you could insert them separately to the bases. 
Is there any subwoofer included or any connector to hook up a subwoofer? 
No subwoofer/DEEP BASS. This soundbar focus on people need loud and stereo sound with limited budgets. If you have special needs for DEEP BASS, please skip this product. 
Why does streaming sound static? Does it support Netflix or Amazon Prime video? 
Please switch the sound setting to STEREO output when you use streaming. (in your app such as Netflix or TV setting) 
Why is there no sound? Why does the sound occasionally sound terrible? 
Note: Please set your TV sound setting to PCM mode - Different TV have different sound setting, please provide your TV model for specific setting process according to your TV model.

Frequently Asked Questions 
Q: When I use APPs such as Netflix on the TV, the soundbar has no sound.
A: The soundbar does not support Dolby and DTS, please kindly disable the Dolby and DTS on your TV audio settings or streaming video APPs like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube. 
Q: How to quickly disconnect the current Bluetooth device connected with Soundbar?
A: Press and hold the BT button on remote /M button on soundbar for about 2 seconds to disconnect the current Bluetooth device. 
Q: My dog chewed my remote, how do l get a replacement remote?
A: We provide free replacement soundbar accessories, including remotes. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us. 
Q: How do I use TV remote to control the soundbar?
A: The IR code of the remote control is not compatible with universal remotes and TV remotes.

title: Bose Smart Ultra Soundbar, Surround Sound System for TV, Dolby Atmos Soundbar for TV Plus Alexa and Google Voice Control, White
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Meet the top-of-the-line Bose Smart Ultra Soundbar that’s here to pull you deep into the heart of all your favorite content. This surround sound system for TV is equipped with Dolby Atmos, which separates music, dialogue, and effects, and places them in different parts of a room for a truly immersive spatial audio experience like you’ve never heard it before. And for content that hasn’t been created in Dolby Atmos, TrueSpace technology works its magic to make your content feel like it’s coming from all around you. Even old school movies, tv shows, and games sound new again with this Bluetooth soundbar for TV. Having a hard time hearing what your favorite characters are saying? A.I. Dialogue Mode balances voice and surround sound for ultra-crisp vocal clarity. With six full-range transducers, including two custom-engineered upward firing dipole speakers, you’ll feel like your space is filled with sound from every direction, even overhead, with this TV speaker. But it’s not just the sound quality you’ll love. Premium materials. Solid construction. Refined finishes. Clever controls. All carefully considered to create a Dolby Atmos soundbar surround sound system that looks as beautiful as it sounds. Amazon Alexa is built in, so just say the word. Or connect the Bluetooth soundbar to a compatible Google device so you can control your content just using your voice. Connect to your TV with either included cable, an optical audio cable or an HDMI eARC cable. Use Bose SimpleSync to connect with different Bose headphones and select Bose Bluetooth speakers.
features: YOUR FAVORITE CONTENT NEVER FELT THIS DEEP: Bose Smart Ultra Soundbar with Dolby Atmos and Voice Control is top-of-the-line wireless speaker, surround sound system for TV and so much more
DOLBY ATMOS SOUNDBAR: TV soundbar features Dolby Atmos and Bose TrueSpace technology which separates sounds and places them in different parts of a room for an immersive spatial audio experience

ULTRA-CRISP DIALOGUE CLARITY: A.I. Dialogue Mode balances voice and surround sound for ultra-crisp vocal clarity, so you never miss what your favorite characters say again with this surround sound speaker

items.text:
Immersive no matter what you’re watching
Experience truly immersive spatial audio powered by Dolby Atmos and TrueSpace. Plus, A.I. Dialogue Mode automatically balances voice and surround sound.

Just plug and play it
The Bose Smart Ultra Soundbar uses a single connection to your TV. Choose either the HDMI eARC connection or the optical audio connection (both cables provided).

Six full-range transducers
Including two custom-engineered upward firing dipole speakers, so you’ll feel like your space is filled with sound from every direction — even overhead.

Stream anything

Control. At your fingertips.

title: Hisense AX3125H 3.1.2Ch Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer, 440W, Dolby Atmos, Bluetooth 5.3, EzPlay, 4K HDMI Pass Through, Roku TV Ready, DTS:X, HDMI/AUX/ARC/Optical/USB, 7 EQ Modes
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Upgrade your audio experience with the AX3125H 3.1.2 channel soundbar and wireless subwoofer. The AX3125H’s 44 0 watts of sound fills the room with a 7-speaker array that also projects sound overhead, making the most of Dolby Atmos, creating an immersive surround sound experience. 7 audio enhancement modes, including movie, music, game, news, sport, night, and AI mode, optimize sound specifically to the content or time of day. And, eARC provides a simple one-cable connection with the included HDMI cable. Bluetooth audio makes it easy to connect your phone, tablet, or laptop wireless to enjoy music and more.
features: 3.1.2 Surround Sound: 7 speakers built into the soundbar. Left and right front channel, center channel, left and right overhead surround channel surround the listener in 3D audio for room filling sound that delivers a true Dolby Atmos experience.

Wireless Subwoofer: A wireless subwoofer delivers the robust low-end frequencies that punctuate your favorite movies, music, and games, without any messy wires. You’ll feel the “boom” while the two front-facing speakers project bright, clear high- and mid-range frequencies.
Quick Touch EQ Modes: Get the best audio performance from music, movies, and news with a simple touch of the remote with 7 preset EQ settings.

Dolby Atmos: Whether you’re gaming, watching your favorite movie or show, or listening to that new track on repeat, Dolby Atmos enhances the entertainment you love across all of your devices. It goes beyond ordinary listening by transporting you with the breakthrough spatial sound experience that draws you in deeper, so you hear and feel more.

Roku TV Ready: As Roku TV Ready device, the Hisense AX3125H Soundbar is fully compatible with any Roku TV through the HDMI (eARC) connection. You can even use the Roku TV remote to control both the TV and soundbar for easier setup and better navigation experience.
Wireless Music Streaming: Wireless Bluetooth technology easily connects to smart devices so the listener can enjoy their favorite playlists from theirphone or other wireless devices.

Easy Connectivity: With HDMI (eARC), the Hisense AX3125H can connect to your TV through a single HDMI cable (included), connect wirelessly via Bluetooth, and control both with one remote. You’ll be enjoying better TV sound in minutes.
Bluetooth Audio: Connect the AX3125H via Bluetooth and enjoy all your favorite music and more, wirelessly, from your phone, tablet or laptop.

title: VIZIO 5.1.2 Elevate Sound Bar with Dolby Atmos, 13 Speakers, Wireless Subwoofer, Alexa - 2023 Model, Black
inStockText: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: A revolution in design, the M-Series Elevate 5.1.2 sound bar from VIZIO packs thrilling sound into a stylish system that’s simple to set up and control. Patented Adaptive Height Speakers concealed beneath the premium charcoal fabric exterior automatically rotate up, reflecting sound from the ceiling for truly immersive Dolby Atmos and DTS:X audio. When rotated forward, these speakers provide a wider soundstage with clear vocals for standard surround and stereo modes, particularly great for music. With 13 total high-performance speakers, the M-Series Elevate features dedicated tweeters and woofers for stunning clarity and spaciousness, two low-profile surround speakers for 360-degree sound, and a newly designed wireless subwoofer that delivers awesome bass down to 45Hz without sacrificing aesthetics. HDMI eARC, 4K Dolby Vision passthrough, Bluetooth 5.0, and a dedicated Voice Assistant Input help ensure peak performance from your connected devices. Immersive sound never looked better.
features: America's Sound Bar - VIZIO has been filling homes with truly immersive audio for over 10 years, and our sound bars just keep getting better. We are proud to provide our customers with top-tier audio products that bring movies, shows, podcasts, music, and more to life like never before. (#1 Sound Bar Brand in 1H 2022 Source: The NPD Group/Retail Tracking Service, U.S., based on units, Jan. - June 2022 combined.)

Evolved to revolve - Adaptive Height Speakers integrated into the sound bar automatically rotate up or forward to optimize the performance of the system. When rotated up, Dolby Atmos and DTS:X soundtracks are strikingly immersive. When rotated forward, the height speakers are repurposed to deliver music with breathtaking power and dynamics.

Immersive sound, brought to you by people who love sound - Dolby Atmos and DTS:X audio technologies captivate your senses with realistic sounds above and behind you for performance that completely immerses you in the world of your entertainment.

Your favorites, the way they were meant to be heard - Lean in and get lost in your favorite content with 103dB of premium audio powered by 13 high-performance speakers. With a newly designed wireless subwoofer and integrated tweeters and woofers, this sound bar delivers clarity, spaciousness, and impact down to an impressive 45Hz.

Multi-dimensional masterpiece - Experience the thrill of sound that moves throughout your room with 5.1.2 channels of immersive audio. Each channel plays a pivotal role in the creation of a soundscape that places you in the middle of your entertainment.

It’s psychoacoustics, but you can call it magic - An optical illusion for your ears, DTS Virtual:X technology delivers the sensation of speakers placed throughout your room, above and behind you, for a sonic landscape that’s remarkably lifelike.

inStockText: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.

description: More than just a great soundbar, the JBL Bar 1300 is a full sound system with MultiBeam™ and six up-firing drivers delivering massive Dolby Atmos® and DTS:X 3D surround sound. Along with using the battery-powered wireless detachable speakers as rear speakers, pair any one to your Bluetooth device, or both for a powerful stereo system.
features: True Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, and MultiBeam Surround Sound: Immerse yourself in theater-quality 3D sound. With four up-firing drivers in the main bar and two more in the detachable speakers, the JBL Bar 1300 delivers true Dolby Atmos and DTS:X together with MultiBeam for an enhanced 3D surround sound experience.

Real surround sound with detachable surround speakers: Enjoy real surround sound without the hassle of extra wires and power connections. Just place the two detachable battery-powered surround speakers behind you and get swept away in amazing audio.

Built-In Wi-Fi with AirPlay, Alexa Multi-Room Music and Chromecast built-in: Get ready to explore. Access over 300 online music streaming services through AirPlay, Alexa MRM and Chromecast built-in. Enjoy all of your favorite audio content, Internet radio, and podcasts in high definition. The Wi-Fi connection also allows automatic software updates, so you can always enjoy the latest features.
1170W output power: With 1170 watts of total system power, the JBL Bar 1300 transforms your movies, music and games into immersive sound experiences and pulls you into the middle of the action.
12" Wireless subwoofer: Thrilling, precise bass from a mighty 12" wireless subwoofer brings the excitement to your action movies and the emotion to your music.

Can the YAS-209 do everything an Amazon Echo device can? 
Almost! Alternative wake words, calling, drop-ins and messaging are not supported. The YAS-209 does not support all streaming services. 
What streaming services does the YAS-209 support? 
Amazon Music, Audible, Kindle, Spotify, Pandora, TuneIn, Deezer, iHeart Radio and SiriusXM are supported through the latest firmware version. In addition, the YAS-209 allows you to stream from your smart device using Spotify Connect or Bluetooth. 
Can I control a Fire TV device with the YAS-209? 
Yes. When both the sound bar and the Fire TV device are linked in the Alexa app, you can control the Fire TV with the sound bar’s built-in Alexa function. 
How do I get my free trial for Amazon Music Unlimited? 
After you activate Alexa through the Sound Bar Controller app, you will get an email with information on activating your free trial. 
Does the YAS-209 work with Google Assistant? 
No.

I only receive 2 small speakers, is the real soundbar missing? Where is the sound bar? 
No. Those 2 small "speakers" as you mentioned are actually 2 soundbars, which could be combined into 1 large soundbar or you could insert them separately to the bases. 
Is there any deep bass? or subwoofer included or any connector to hook up a subwoofer? 
No subwoofer/DEEP BASS. This soundbar focus on people need loud and stereo sound with limited budgets. If you have special needs for DEEP BASS, please skip this product. 
Why does streaming sound static? Does it support Netflix or Amazon Prime video? 
Please switch the sound setting to STEREO output when you use streaming. (in app setting such as Netflix or TV setting) 
Why is there no sound? Why does the sound occasionally sound terrible? 
Note: Please set your TV sound setting to PCM mode - Different TV have different sound setting, please provide TV model to us for specific setting process according to your TV model.

𝗕𝗹𝘂𝗲𝘁𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗶𝘁𝘆: With seamless Bluetooth integration, our sound bar enables you to stream your favorite music from your phone, tablet, laptop, Smart TV or other Bluetooth-enabled devices directly, providing a hassle-free and wireless audio experience.

𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗰𝘁 & 𝗦𝗹𝗲𝗲𝗸 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻: The Geoyeao sound bar boasts a compact and sleek design that complements your TV and the aesthetics of your living space, bedroom or computer table, making it an elegant addition to your home theater setup.

Through the LED display, whether you're using the buttons on the soundbar or the remote control, you can clearly see the current mode as well as the volume level (the maximum volume is 32 (with a decibel level of 120db)). Furthermore, with the remote control, you have the freedom to activate the 3D sound effects, adjust the bass and treble, or even turn off the LED display (by long pressing the 3D button for 10 seconds).

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Officially Certified from Dolby Labs' 
Unlike traditional soundbar, which directs audio in a single direction. With Dolby Atmos certified soundbars don't just direct sound in one direction, they create a 360° sound field. With it, action movies or concerts feel much more realistic and dynamic. Whether it's rain falling, a car screeching, or a band playing, With Dolby Atmos brings the sound to life. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Soundbar with Subwoofer + Soundbar with Dolby Atmos = Cinema Magic, Home Comfort 

Soundbar with Subwoofer provides a rich and deep bass sound, giving an impactful low-frequency effect and more depth to your movie or music experience. 
Soundbar with Dolby Atmos signifies advanced audio technology that delivers immersive sound, creating a panoramic audio environment in your living room, making you feel like you're in the movie scene itself. 
In essence, with our product, you can enjoy a cinema-like audio experience, transforming your home into a comfortable private theater. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
5.25'' Large Woofer + Large Air Port Design = Super Powerful Bass 

In the realm of audio equipment, the configuration and design are crucial determinants of the sound output. The large air port design works in conjunction with the sizeable woofer, not only allows the system to produce more volume with the same amount of power but also drastically reduces distortion. Together, these two features synergize to create a "super powerful bass shock". You would experience not just the sound, but also the vibrational energy - a truly immersive listening experience. 
A Sound Bar Brings The Cinema to Your Home 

360° Surround Sound: HD-029 makes you feel like you're right in the middle of the movie.
Clear and Bright Dialogues: Geoyeao sound bars enhances dialogue clarity, making dialogues in movies or TV shows clearer.
Easy Setup: Our sound bars are designed for easy hookup to your TV or other entertainment systems, via HDMI ARC, Optical, Aux and Coxial Port.
Powerful Bass
Great Compatibility: It compatible with a range of devices such as smart TVs, projectors, gaming consoles, Bluetooth devices, and more.

description: America's #1 Sound Bar* VIZIO has been filling homes with truly immersive audio for over 10 years, and our sound bars just keep getting better. We are proud to provide our customers with top-tier audio products that bring movies, shows, podcasts, music, and more to life like never before. features: America's Sound Bar VIZIO has been filling homes with truly immersive audio for over 10 years, and our sound bars just keep getting better. Immersive sound, brought to you by people who love sound. - Dolby Atmos and DTS:X audio technologies captivate your senses with realistic sounds above and behind you for performance that completely immerses you in the world of your entertainment.

It’s psychoacoustics, but you can call it magic. - An optical illusion for your ears, DTS Virtual:X technology delivers the sensation of speakers placed throughout your room, above and behind you, for a sonic landscape that’s remarkably lifelike.

Your favorites, the way they were meant to be heard. - Lean in and get lost in your favorite content with 98dB of premium audio powered by 6 high-performance speakers. With integrated tweeters and woofers, this sound bar delivers clarity, spaciousness, and impact down to an impressive 50Hz.

Minimalist design. Maximum impact. - Thanks to built-in dual subwoofers and a fully integrated design, the M-Series All-In-One sound bar needs no external components to sound its best. And at just 36 inches in width, it’ll fit just about anywhere.

This bar keeps a low profile. - Enjoy the show without obstruction. At just over two inches in height, the fabric-wrapped, low-profile design serves to reduce the visual weight of the system as it sits discretely beneath your TV.

description: The soundbar features 2 full-range speakers, 2 tweeters, 2 bass diaphragms, and a total of 6 sound bodies. It delivers balanced sound with enhanced bass for an immersive 3D surround sound experience. Ideal for listening to music while working or as background music during meals, its compact design fits perfectly in small spaces like living rooms, offices, or bedrooms. Whether for gaming or watching movies, it creates a concert-like or cinematic atmosphere, enhancing your entertainment experience at home
features: 【Detachable sound bar】:The 2 in 1 sound bar, suitable for TVs, computers, and more, is innovative. In detachable mode, it connects to a base accessory and can be placed on either side of the TV to create two two-tower soundbars, delivering immersive 3D surround sound. You can also combine the two tower speakers into a long soundbar for placement on a table or mounted on the wall. It not only provides a more immersive listening experience but also serves as an elegant piece of decoration

【6 Audio Sources&Powerful Bass】: The 100W soundbar features 2 full-range speakers, 2 tweeters, and 2 bass diaphragms, for total 6 audio drivers that deliver 3D surround bass sound. It's perfect for enjoying music working or dining. its compact design makes it a great choice for small spaces like living rooms, offices, or bedrooms. Whether gaming or watching movies, it creates a concert-like or personal theater atmosphere, enhancing overall home entertainment experience

【Upgraded 5.3 Bluetooth &5 Connection Methods】: The TV sound bar is upgraded with Bluetooth 5.3, offering faster and more stable connections, and easily connects to any Bluetooth device and improves sound clarity. Sound bar for smart TV supports USB, AUX, Optical, and HDMI ARC. In HDMI ARC mode, you can easily control the soundbar with your TV remote control. it has a dedicated subwoofer port for connecting the external subwoofer (not included), enhancing bass effect

【Distinct EQ Modes & Home Theater Audio】: The TV soundbar offers 3 customizable EQ modes for music, movies, and games, allowing to personalize your listening experience, and enjoy deep, immersive sound. The soundbar delivers cinematic 3D audio, ensuring explosion sound quality in any scene. Whether you're watching a movie enjoying a concert, or catching up on the news, the sound bar enhances the audio of your TV shows and movies for a richer, more dynamic experience

【Two control methods】: The TV speakers feature two convenient control methods. You can use the remote control to adjust the surround sound volume, switch tracks, and enjoy the listening experience. you can also use the buttons on the TV sound bar to control the volume

【Note】: In HDMI ARC mode, the volume of the device and the sound bar are synchronized, and you only need to control the volume of one. In other connection modes, the volume between the device and the sound bar is independent and needs to be adjusted separately. It is recommended that you turn down the volume on the TV before connecting
【After-sales 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭】: Client satisfaction is our top priority. We provide a 12-month warranty and 24/7 online technical support to provide you with satisfactory help at any time.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Why Should You Choose Our Sound Bar? 
Upgraded 5.3 Bluetooth: The new version provides a more steady connection, lower latency, and improved energy efficiency
High-quality Sound: Sound bar delivers clear sound and are a simple solution to improving your TV’s sound quality
Built-in Subwoofers: The built-in subwoofer delivers excellent deep bass, with a more noticeable effect in movie mode
100W Output Power: 100W sound bar delivers strong and room-filling sound. Its high-powered audio output ensures deep bass, clear mids, and crisp highs
3D Stereo Experience: Surround sound technology puts you in every scene of the movie, bringing you an immersive, great home theater experience
3 EQ Modes: Sound bar for smart TV supports music mode, movie mode, and news mode, to cope with different scenes, use different frequency signals to adjust the speakers
32 Inches Sound Bar &6 Sound Sources 
32"Soundbar Speaker:The 32-inch TV sound bar has a compact design and takes up little space, making it perfect for modern home living rooms or small spaces. It fits in with any home style
6 Sound Sources: Sound bar features 2 full-range speakers, 2 tweeters, and 2 bass diaphragms, delivering 3D surround bass sound
Full-range drivers:The home audio sound bar provides balanced audio performance, covering midrange and some low and high frequencies, and is the core of the sound system
Tweeter: Focuses on high-frequency content, enhancing the clarity and detail of the sound, making it brighter and clearer
Bass Driver: Responsible for deep low-frequency output, enhancing the bass effect of the sound system, and improving the sense of impact and dynamic performance
How to Fix the Issue of No Sound From the Soundbar（HDMI ARC Connection）? 
Check all cable connections between the soundbar and TV 
Check and ensure that the audio settings on the TV are PCM modes 
Tips: TV Settings > Home > Settings> Sound > Digital Audio Output > PCM 
Make sure there is no other audio port input on your device 
Please set the TV to digital audio output and select PCM output 
Note: If your TV and soundbar are connected via other cables, remember to unplug the other cables when switching to other connection methods 
Newest Bluetooth 5.3 
Sound bar adopts the New Bluetooth Version 5.3. The new version provides a more stable connection, lower latency, and improved energy efficiency. The 10M stable transmission distance ultra-low input lag gives you stutter-free music, podcasts, and more 
LED Indicator Lights 
The indicator lights on the sound bar, which are different colors, indicate different connection modes. Judge the connection mode based on the color. Bluetooth mode is blue, HDMI RAC is white, AUX is green, optical is cyan, USB is purple 
Multiple Connections 
The sound bar supports HDMI ARC, Optical, USB, and AUX connectivity to ensure compatibility, making it perfect for your devices. It is compatible with smart TVs, computers, projectors, phones, tablets, etc. Sound bar for smart TV, perfect for your TV

title: Sony HT-A3000 Soundbar, TV Surround Sound System Dolby Atmos And DTS:X Support, 360 Spatial Sound Mapping Technology, Auto Calibrated Room Sound, Home Audio Sound Bars
inStockText: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.  Only 16 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of a wireless surround sound system with the Sony HT-A3000 3.1ch Dolby Atmos Soundbar. This wireless surround sound system for TV is designed to transform your living room into a personal cinema, offering an unparalleled audio experience. More than just a wireless sound bar for smart TV, the Sony HT-A3000 boasts 360 Spatial Sound Mapping technology that tailors a sound field to your unique space. By adding optional rear surround sound speakers, it creates a sound field that adapts to your room's acoustics, delivering a personalized and optimized audio experience. This surround sound system for TV is equipped with dual subwoofers and three front speakers, ensuring clear dialogue and immersive sound. These speakers for TV are a boon for movie enthusiasts and gamers, guaranteeing every word is heard distinctly, and every sound effect is deeply felt. Elevate your home theater experience with the Sony HT-A3000 and its optional wireless subwoofer and rear speakers. This wireless surround sound system allows you to customize your sound system to your preference, adding even more depth and dimension to your audio experience. With built-in support for Spotify Connect, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Chromecast built-in, and Apple AirPlay 2, these surround sound speakers let you enjoy music from a multitude of sources. The Sony HT-A3000 is a dream for any home theater enthusiast, allowing you to play your favorite tunes from various platforms.
features: WIRELESS SOUNDBAR: Experience the magic of a wireless surround sound system with the Sony HT-A3000 3.1ch Dolby Atmos Soundbar. This wireless surround sound system for TV transforms every viewing into an engaging and enjoyable experience.

SMART TV COMPATIBLE: The Sony HT-A3000 is more than just a soundbar, it's a wireless sound bar for smart TV with built-in support for various music streaming platforms. Switching between different surround sound speakers and streaming platforms is a breeze, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable listening experience.

IMMERSIVE AUDIO: Step into a new dimension of listening with the Sony HT-A3000 Soundbar's surround sound system for TV. These speakers for TV deliver a truly immersive live concert or studio session experience, making you feel as if you're in the room with the musicians.

SOPHISTICATED DESIGN: The Sony HT-A3000 Soundbar is not just about superior sound quality; it's also a home theater with a sophisticated design. This wireless surround sound system not only enhances the sound quality but also adds a touch of elegance to your home decor.

VOICE CONTROL: Designed to work seamlessly with Google Assistant, the Sony HT-A3000 Soundbar can be controlled using voice commands, making these surround sound speakers incredibly convenient to use. In essence, this home theater's compatibility with Google Assistant enhances its usability, making it a smart choice for modern homes.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
HT-A3000 
Step inside the sound 
3.1ch Dolby Atmos Sound Bar 
Immersive surround sound from our premium soundbar 
Utilizing a combination of technology such as Vertical Surround Engine, S-Force Pro Front Surround and 360 Spatial Sound Mapping, the HT-A3000 offers immersive sound that comes from all around you. Dolby Atmos and DTS:X lend a more realistic, multi-dimensional sound to your content. 
Sound Field Optimization 
With Sound Field Optimization, the HT-A3000 can be calibrated to your unique room environment. Even if you move the soundbar to another room, you can use the calibration to optimize sound to the new space. 
360 Spatial Sound with optional rear speakers 
With optional rear speakers added (sold separately), 360 Spatial Sound Mapping technology creates a sound field optimized for your unique space enveloping you in sound from multiple phantom speakers. And with and a wide listening area, everyone gets the same sound experience. 
Expandable sound system 
For enhanced listening, you have options: Our subwoofers (SA-SW3 and SA-SW5) and rear speaker sets (SA-RS3S or SA-RS5) are designed to expand your listening experience—just power them on and they pair automatically with your soundbar. 
360 Spatial Sound Mapping 

Unique 360 Spatial Sound Mapping technology calibrates sound to your room for an environment that seems to expand beyond the walls.

HT-A3000 3.1ch Dolby Atmos Soundbar 

Immersive sound for your favorite entertainment. The HT-A3000 has three front speakers, a center channel, and a powerful built-in dual subwoofer for clear dialogue and authentic surround sound.

Immersive surround sound 
Built-in dual subwoofers and three front speakers including a center channel for clear dialogue. 
Omnidirectional block design 
The HT-A3000 and optional speakers have sophisticated rounded edges representing a single solid block providing wide-spreading sound. 
Voice Assistant Compatibility 
Connect to your home’s other devices with Google Assistant or Amazon Alexa. 
Easy Listening 
Stream your way with Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Chromecast built-in, Spotify Connect, and Apple AirPlay 2. 
Effortless control & Immersion 
Pairs with select Sony BRAVIA TV's for easy access to soundbar controls. 
Set up in seconds 
Simply plug in the soundbar, connect to your TV using the HDMI eARC connection and power on. 
Easy UI 
The front panel display shows the volume level, sound mode, and input, while an easy on-screen interface lets you make more detailed adjustments. 
360 Reality Audio 
Discover a new way of listening with 360 Reality Audio for a truly immersive live concert or studio session experience.

title: Klipsch Flexus CORE 200 3.1.2 Channel Powered by Onkyo Bluetooth Sound Bar with Dolby Atmos and Custom Tuned Bass - Black
inStockText: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.  Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: The Klipsch Core 200 Sound System, powered by Onkyo, lays the foundation for amazing movie nights, gripping gaming campaigns that go late into the night, and streaming the next binge-worthy show. Powered by exceptional acoustics and proprietary Klipsch Transport technology, this 3.1.2-channel sound bar is the first step towards building the whole home entertainment ecosystem of your dreams.
features: POWERED BY ONKYO: We’ve teamed up with Onkyo, combining their decades of proven manufacturing and tech prowess with our classic Klipsch acoustics, to ensure your home entertainment system is as epic in audio quality as it is in reliability.

SOLID FOUNDATIONS: 3.1.2-CHANNEL SOUND BAR: Powered by exceptional acoustics and proprietary Klipsch Transport technology, this 3.1.2-channel sound bar is the first step towards building the whole home entertainment ecosystem of your dreams.

DOLBY ATMOS FOR IMMERSIVE, MULTIDIMENSIONAL SOUND: Built for processing the newest movies, shows, and games, the Klipsch Flexus Core 200 features powerful Dolby Atmos technology: two built-in elevation speakers.
CUSTOM-TUNED SOUND, BEST BASS IN CLASS: Four 2.25” ceramic drivers finely tuned by Klipsch acousticians and dual 4” built-in subwoofers for best-in-class bass – no subwoofer required.

CRYSTAL CLEAR DIALOG THANKS TO CLASSIC KLIPSCH TECH: The Flexus Core 200 Sound System features a dedicated horn-loaded tweeter for vocal clarity so you never miss a beat. Dramas with tense dialog scenes or action-packed thrillers sound clearer than ever thanks to this innovative Klipsch technology as your dedicated center channel.

KLIPSCH TRANSPORT TECH FOR ULTIMATE CONNECTIVITY: Enjoy lightning-quick connections across multiple channels with patented Klipsch Transport technology by adding Flexus Surrounds and a Flexus Subwoofer (or two) to your easily expandable home theater system.

PEACE OF MIND TESTING PROCESS: Thoroughly reviewed by a team of trusted engineers, over 1,000 rigorous tests were performed on Flexus products to ensure awesome audio performance and stellar interconnectivity.

STYLED FOR ANY AESTHETIC: The Klipsch Flexus Core 200 was meticulously engineered down to the last millimeter with premium materials, thoughtful design, and calculated engineering for a family of products to fit any space or aesthetic.

ECO-CONSCIOUS PACKAGING: We’re committed to providing great sound for generations - which is why our packaging is designed to be earth-friendly, with careful consideration to minimize waste and maximize recyclability.

title: TCL S45H S Class 2.0 Channel Sound Bar with Dolby Atmos, DTS Virtual:X, Bluetooth Music Streaming, and Auto Room Calibration
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Step up to great sound with our TCL 2.0 channel S Class sound bar featuring Dolby Atmos and DTS Virtual:X. Easy connectivity with HDMI eARC, Bluetooth, and more. Enjoy your favorite entertainment with crisp, clear sound making movies and music truly come to life.
features: 2.0 Channel S Class Sound Bar - Fill your room with sound, bringing the movie theater experience into your home with just a single HDMI cable. It’s home theater, made simple.
Dolby Atmos and DTS Virtual:X - Spatial sound from above and behind putting you in the center of movies, music, and games.
Up to 100 Watts Total Power - Room-filling audio sound will immerse you in your favorite movies, TV shows, and music, delivering powerful audio experience.

Bluetooth Wireless Music Streaming - Stream your favorite music wirelessly with Bluetooth connectivity that allows you to play your favorite songs from your smartphone, tablet, or other Bluetooth-enabled device.
Built-In Bass Reflex Port - Strong, clear bass from a compact package.
Ai Sonic Auto Room Calibration - Get optimal sound quality with Auto Room Calibration powered by AI Sonic that tailors the sound to your unique space.
DTS Virtual:X - Virtualized sound for an immersive experience, no matter the content.
HDMI eARC - One easy cable connection to the ARC/eARC input of your TV brings the cinema experience to your living room.
Digital Optical Audio Input - Added flexibility for connection to TVs without HDMI ARC or eARC.
USB Audio Playback - Audio playback via USB provides hours of music enjoyment.

title: ULTIMEA 5.0ch Sound Bar for Smart TV, Soundbar with RGB Light for PC, Detachable Soundbar for TV with App Control, 180W Peak Power, Bluetooth 5.3 TV Soundbar, HDMI-ARC/Opt/AUX, Wall Mount, Apollo S70
