features: 5.0 Channel and BassMX Technology: With 5 advanced full-range drivers, this 5.0 channel sound bar creates balanced and immersive sound. Ultimea's "BassMX" enriches low frequencies for adjustable bass. Aerospace-grade magnets and composite diaphragms ensure clear dialogue and sensitive audio performance.

Preset RGB Modes and Millions of Colors: Take smart control of this soundbar's RGB lighting, easily adjusting the color and brightness to react and move to the beat of your music, movie, and gaming for an immersive sound and light experience like no other. Choose from 6 dynamic modes and millions of colors to create a lively party scene on the Apollo S70 sound bar for your space.

Home Decor Enhancement: The Apollo S70 sound bar not only delivers exceptional sound quality but also functions as a 2-in-1 entertainment hub, blending high-quality audio with dynamic RGB lighting. This tv soundbar enhances your listening experience while adding vibrant colors to your space, elevating both the atmosphere and aesthetic of your home. Please note: In rhythm mode, the soundbar's backlights sync with the sound, but they do not synchronize with the colors and rhythm of the TV screen.

Detachable Design with Center Channel: The 3-in-1 pc soundbar's detachable design with an extra center channel makes the human voice clearer and sound more balanced while enhancing the sense of positioning to achieve audio-visual synchronization allowing you to assemble it in various styles to fit your room's layout and atmosphere. The split design saves space while still enhancing the sound field.

Ultimea Smart App Control: Ultimea is dedicated to making life more intelligent through the Ultimea Home. title: Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 9 Soundbar with 13 Speaker Units, Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, IMAX Enhanced HT-A9000, Wireless Surround Sound System for TV
inStockText: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.  Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Experience the thrill of a movie theater at home with this sound bar, the Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 9. It's not just a soundbar, it's a revolution in home audio. Home audio sound bars have never been this powerful. With 13 speakers and 360 Spatial Sound Mapping, this soundbar fills your room with immersive, theater-like surround sound. Imagine a sound bar for smart TV that transforms your living room into a cinema. That's what the Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 9 does with its 360 Spatial Sound Mapping technology. This wireless sound bar for smart TV auto-calibrates the sound to your room's characteristics, ensuring the best possible audio experience regardless of your room's size or shape. This speaker for TV, the Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 9, is more than just a soundbar. It's a complete home theater solution that pairs seamlessly with compatible BRAVIA TV models. These speakers for TV enhance your viewing experience, making it more immersive and enjoyable with Acoustic Center Sync. Stay ahead of the game with this Bluetooth soundbar for TV, the Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 9. It supports the latest video and gaming features, including 4K HDR, 8K HDR, Dolby Vision and HDMI 2.1. This soundbar for TV also offers exclusive features for the PS5, ensuring the best possible gaming experience with stunning visuals and immersive audio. The Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 9 is more than just home theater speakers. It's a complete entertainment hub that allows you to wirelessly stream music with support for Spotify Connect, Apple AirPlay 2 and Bluetooth. This sound bar is designed to make your life easier and more enjoyable, providing high-quality audio for all your entertainment needs.
features: 3D SOUND: Experience a three-dimensional sound field with this sound bar, the Sony BRAVIA Theater Bar 9's 360 Spatial Sound Mapping. Home audio sound bars like this one extend the sound beyond your living room, making every movie or music experience unforgettable.

OPTIMIZED AUDIO: This sound bar for smart tv optimizes your audio experience to your room's characteristics with the Sound Field Optimization feature. As a wireless sound bar for smart tv, it ensures optimal audio performance in any environment, delivering crystal-clear, room-filling sound.

CINEMA-QUALITY: Feel the thrill of cinema-quality sound at home with this speaker for tv, supporting industry-standard formats including Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, and IMAX Enhanced. These speakers for tv deliver realistic sound that puts you right in the middle of the action.

IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE: Enhance your cinematic experience by adding a wireless subwoofer (SW3/SA-SW5) and rear speakers (RS3S/RS5) to this bluetooth soundbar for tv. This soundbar for tv boosts the soundbar's performance, delivering even more immersive sound.

IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE: Enhance your cinematic experience by adding a wireless subwoofer (SW3/SA-SW5) and rear speakers (RS3R/RS5) to this bluetooth soundbar for tv. This soundbar for tv boosts the soundbar's performance, delivering even more immersive sound.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
BRAVIA Theater Bar 9 
Premium cinematic surround sound 
Sound bar with 13 speakers and Dolby Atmos/DTS:X 
Cinema is coming home 
Feel the emotion and excitement of the movies with BRAVIA Theater. Our decades of professional filmmaking experience allow us to faithfully recreate the creators vision at home with intricate surround sound and spatial audio. 
Unleash the full potential of surround sound 
360 Spatial Sound Mapping creates multiple phantom speakers around you and reflects sound off the ceiling and walls, enabling cinema-style surround sound from a single soundbar. Add optional wireless rear speakers for an even more expansive sound stage. 
Room optimized sound 
Turn the whole room into a movie theater. Sound Field Optimization analyzes and calibrates sound to your room’s size, acoustic characteristics, and your listening position. 
Sound straight from cinema 
Bring authentic cinema surround sound quality to your living room. BRAVIA Theatre supports industry-standard formats including Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, and IMAX Enhanced certification. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Innovative acoustic design 
With 13 speaker units, BRAVIA Theater Bar 9 delivers exceptional acoustic performance. Hear precise spatial audio with dedicated front, center, and up-firing speaker channels. 
Expand your surround sound 
Expand the cinematic experience with optional wireless subwoofer (SA-SW3 or SA-SW5) and rear speakers (SA-RS3R or SA-RS5) to hear sound with even greater impact. Connection is simplified as the subwoofer and rear speakers automatically pair when powered on. Subwoofers and speakers sold separately. 
BRAVIA Theater and BRAVIA TV 
Pair with BRAVIA TV for a cinema-like experience. Hear people’s voices clearly with Voice Zoom 3 when connected with compatible BRAVIA TV. 
Easy UI and setup 
Use BRAVIA Connect app to easily control BRAVIA Theater from your smartphone and change volume, sound profiles, and advanced settings. 
High-Resolution Audio 
Get the most out of all your entertainment. Supports video formats 4K HDR, 8K HDR, Dolby Vision and HDMI 2.1 gaming features 4K120, VRR, ALLM. 
Stream music from everywhere 
Support for Spotify Connect, Apple AirPlay 2 and Bluetooth lets you wirelessly stream music and enjoy every detail in high-quality upmixed sound.

items.text: With 13 speaker units, BRAVIA Theater Bar 9 delivers exceptional acoustic performance. Hear precise spatial audio with dedicated front, center, and up-firing speaker channels.

items.title: Expand your surround sound
items.text: Expand the cinematic experience with optional wireless subwoofer (SA-SW3 or SA-SW5) and rear speakers (SA-RS3R or SA-RS5) to hear sound with even greater impact. Connection is simplified as the subwoofer and rear speakers automatically pair when powered on. Subwoofers and speakers sold separately.

items.title: BRAVIA Theater and BRAVIA TV
items.text: Pair with BRAVIA TV for a cinema-like experience. Hear people’s voices clearly with Voice Zoom 3 when connected with compatible BRAVIA TV.

items.title: Easy UI and setup
items.text: Use BRAVIA Connect app to easily control BRAVIA Theater from your smartphone and change volume, sound profiles, and advanced settings.

items.title: High-Resolution Audio
items.text: Get the most out of all your entertainment. Supports video formats 4K HDR, 8K HDR, Dolby Vision and HDMI 2.1 gaming features 4K120, VRR, ALLM.

items.title: Stream music from everywhere
items.text: Support for Spotify Connect, Apple AirPlay 2 and Bluetooth lets you wirelessly stream music and enjoy every detail in high-quality upmixed sound.

title: Denon DHT-S517 Sound Bar for TV with Wireless Subwoofer, 3D Surround Sound, Dolby Atmos, HDMI eARC Compatibility, Wireless Music Streaming via Bluetooth, Quick Setup, Wall-Mountable
inStockText: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: The Denon DHT-S517 premium soundbar takes your home entertainment up a notch with its left and right channel tweeters and midrange drivers, a dedicated center-channel driver, and two up-firing speakers, while the powerful wireless subwoofer delivers enhanced bass for your music, movies, and TV shows. Experience crystal clear dialogue and enveloping sound with Denon’s dialogue enhancer that lets you turn up the dialogue without having to adjust overall volume. Features a pure mode that eliminates surround processing and removes any adjusted characteristics associated with Movie, Music, or Night modes. Additionally, the DHT-S517 allows unlimited wireless music streaming at your fingertips via Bluetooth. Connect your Bluetooth-enabled smart device and directly stream your music to the soundbar. Enjoy a single-wire connection to your TV with included HDMI input and output with Enhanced Audio Return Channel (eARC) (Non-HDMI ARC TVs can connect via the digital optical input). All cables are included for a simplified setup.
features: TRANSFORM ANY TV INTO A HOME THEATER SYSTEM - With (2) 1" tweeters, (2) 4.7” x 1.6” midranges, (1) 1" center-channel driver & (2) up-firing speakers, the Denon DHT-S517 soundbar with wireless sub offers immersive 3D audio with Dolby Atmos overhead effects

UNIVERSAL CONNECTIVITY - Experience exceptional sound clarity from your TV through a single HDMI connection. Connect your TV, Blu-ray and other devices via HDMI eARC, ARC or digital optical input, and seamlessly control the sound bar with your TV remote

HEAR EVERY WORD WITH DIALOGUE ENHANCER – Denon brings to you an intelligent way of enhancing dialogue, making it sound crisp without adjusting the overall volume. Enjoy crystal clear movie and TV dialogues, even during loud scenes or complex soundtracks

UNLIMITED WIRELESS MUSIC STREAMING - Enjoy your favorite tracks at your fingertips with the DHT-S517 that allows you to connect your Bluetooth-enabled smart device and directly stream your music to the sound bar via Bluetooth

EASY SETUP - With all cables in the box, a Quick Start Guide, and a straightforward user concept, the DHT-S517 is easy to install and use. Just under 3" tall, it fits below the TV without blocking the IR remote sensor. Place it on a shelf or wall-mount it

CUSTOMIZED AUDIO FOR ANY OCCASION - With three different sound modes - Movie, Night, and Music, you can choose the perfect mode for all your entertainment. The Denon Pure Mode eliminates any surround sound processing and other adjusted characteristics

With its 110-year legacy and Japanese precision technology, Denon BRINGS PURITY OF SOUND AND JOY TO YOUR LIFE. Immerse yourself in multi-dimensional audio and Hi-Fi surround sound with this soundbar & subwoofer for an exceptional home entertainment system

title: Polk MagniFi Mini AX Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer, Dolby Atmos and DTS:X Certified, Polk's Patented VoiceAdjust & SDA Technologies, Ultra-Compact Design, Easy Setup, Black
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Elevate your home theater experience with the Polk MagniFi Mini AX soundbar. This high-performance soundbar delivers Dolby Atmos and DTS:X certified cinematic surround sound. Its advanced five-speaker array and patented SDA surround technology create a wider, more immersive soundstage. Stream music wirelessly from your smartphone or PC via Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, AirPlay 2, Chromecast, or Spotify Connect. Features Polk's Voice Adjust technology that seamlessly blends with the integrated center channel speaker to deliver clear dialogues. The soundbar offers easy setup through HDMI eARC/ARC, optical, or AUX inputs, ensuring compatibility with most TVs. Included is a next-gen subwoofer with a 10" downward-firing driver, delivering deep, impactful bass. Customize the bass impact with BassAdjust. Expand the system with optional Polk SR2 wireless surrounds for a complete 5.1 surround sound setup. Transform your home entertainment with the Polk MagniFi Mini AX soundbar. Immerse yourself in a truly cinematic audio experience for movies, TV shows, video games, and music. With its versatile connectivity options, advanced technologies, and optional wireless surrounds, this soundbar takes your home theater to the next level.
features: POWERFUL SOUND FROM AN ULTRA COMPACT SOUND BAR - Featuring an advanced five-speaker array and Polk's SDA technology, the MagniFi Mini AX delivers certified Dolby Atmos and DTS:X cinematic surround sound with impactful bass and an expansive 3D soundstage.Waterproof : No

COMPLETE WIRELESS HOME ENTERTAINMENT - Experience high-quality music streaming from your phone, tablet or computer via Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, AirPlay 2, Chromecast, and Spotify Connect, and enjoy your favorite tracks from all the popular streaming services

HEAR EVERY WORD CLEARLY - Polk's patented VoiceAdjust speech-clarifying technology works with MagniFi's integrated center channel speaker to bring up the voice levels without affecting the rest of the soundtrack. Enjoy clear dialogues and balanced audio

INCLUDES A PLUG-AND-PLAY WIRELESS SUB that connects automatically with the soundbar the moment you power it on. A 10" DOWNWARD FIRING DRIVER fills the room with deep, heart-thumping bass. Use BassAdjust to maximize bass impact for your music and movies

EASY SETUP AND UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY - Allows easy, one-cable set-up with any TV via HDMI eARC/ARC (HDMI cable included), optical, or AUX inputs. The MagniFi is also compatible with most TV remotes and is Roku TV Ready for an easier setup and control

EXPAND YOUR HOME THEATER SYSTEM - Upgrade to the complete MagniFi Mini AX experience by adding Polk SR2 wireless surround speakers (sold separately), and experience immersive, multi-dimensional Dolby or DTS 5.1 surround sound

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
All-in-one immersion. This sleek, single-body Dolby Atmos sound bar has two subwoofer drivers built in, giving you rich bass without the need for a separate sub. Perfect for smaller living rooms, bedrooms and dens, it delivers surprisingly spacious and clear sound. 
Yamaha True Sound + Dolby Atmos 
Developed from the ground up with Yamaha True Sound engineering, the SR-B30A draws on all we know about sound and sound field creation. Dolby Atmos further enhances the listening experience, immersing you in spacious sound that you can feel all around you. 
Simple to set up. Simple to use. 
Previous page
ELEGANTLY LOW-PROFILE 
The SR-B30A features a slim bar that fits neatly in front of or under your TV, with no distracting design elements. 
EASY WALL-MOUNT 
The SR-B30A has built-in keyholes and comes with a paper mounting template that makes it easy to mount to your wall with standard, commercially available hardware. 
GOOD BASS, LESS SPACE 
Using dual built-in subwoofers and a ported, bass-reflex design, the SR-B30A gives you just the right amount of rich bass sound without the need for a separate subwoofer box. 
SUPREMELY SIMPLE CONNECTION 
Connect the SR-B30A to your TV with just a single HDMI or optical cable. Featuring HDMI-CEC and eARC compatibility, it lets you operate basic functions directly from your TV remote control. 
STAY IN CONTROL 
The included, easy-to-use remote control offers access to sound programs and settings. A downloadable app for iOS/Android lets you control the bar from any smartphone or tablet via Bluetooth. 
Next page
Customized Just for You. 
Clear Voice 
Find it hard to hear TV dialogue? Our Clear Voice technology makes human voices more audible. Hear every word -- from YouTube videos to movies and shows, especially when background music and sound effects try to take center stage. 
Four Sound Modes 
With four different sound modes, you can match the sound to your content and mood. Stereo mode works great for music and podcasts. Standard mode is ideas for TV programs. Try Game mode to immerse yourself in your latest battle, and use Movie mode to create and expansive theater experience.

title: PHILIPS B8507B 3.1-Channel Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer and Dolby Atmos - Black
inStockText: Only 15 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Philips B8507 Soundbar brings true cinema sound into your living room. With 3.1 channels and dedicated center-channel speakers , you get great vocal clarity and a more impactful movie watching experience. The special geometry and the two extra angled tweeter speakers widens the soundstage and gives you a clear separation of instruments. The system thumps out a total of 600 W max output that delivers rumbling explosions that you can feel. Dolby Atmos’ spatial sound technology makes everything you watch breathtakingly real. Whether it's spaceships flying overhead or the crowd in an arena, you'll feel the drama flow above and around you. Stream playlists from your mobile device via Bluetooth. Your media sounds richer, deeper and clearer through this phenomenal soundbar and subwoofer. You can also connect via Audio in, Optical in, HDMI eARC or use a USB drive for music. You can control your Soundbar directly with your TV remote. No extra remote needed. And thanks to Play-Fi compatibility, this soundbar can also be synced with other Play-Fi compatible devices to create a multiple-room audio system, just the way you like it.
features: TRUE CINEMA SOUND: This 3.1-channel soundbar with 600 W max power takes your listening experience to a new level. You get incredibly rich sound and scintillating details. The impressive 6.5" wireless subwoofer delivers room-rocking bass.

WIDEN THE SOUNDSTAGE: Uniquely designed angled tweeters at either end of the soundbar broaden the audio and send soundwaves rippling across the room, so you can hear the distinct textures of different instruments as if you’re really in the hall.

HEIGHTEN THE EXCITEMENT: Dolby Atmos’ unique 3D sound technology pulls you deeper into the story. 3 channels reproduce height as well as depth, so you feel soundwaves ripple above your head every time a helicopter passes on screen.

HOME SOUND MADE EASY: Expand into a true surround-sound system by setting up additional Play-Fi speakers (sold separately). You can sync and group your devices with the DTS Play-Fi app and stream your favorite playlist to every room without dropping a beat.
EXPERIENCE FRONT-ROW SOUND: Stadium EQ Mode transforms your living room into a live sports stadium. Feel the crowd’s intensity, immerse yourself in the game, and still hear crystal clear commentary.
WORKS SEAMLESSLY WITH ROKU TV: Roku TV Ready means you'll enjoy a smoother setup, easy access to sound settings, and compatibility with your Roku remote when connecting this soundbar to your Roku TV.

THE PERFECT MATCH FOR YOUR HDR TV: High-speed HDM1 eARC can transmit advanced audio formats like Dolby Atmos and DTS:X. For movies and gaming, 4K pass-through lets you connect 4K HDR video sources with no loss of resolution.

STREAM HIGH QUALITY MUSIC: This soundbar lets you enjoy amazing music as well as movies. You can stream your favorite songs via Bluetooth, Spotify Connect or Apple AirPlay 2. Wired options include audio-in, optical in and USB.

CONNECT WITH AMAZON ECHO OR DIGITAL ASSISTANT DEVICES: Ask Alexa-enabled devices or any speaker that works with Google Assistant to play music through the soundbar. Skip tracks and control playback hands-free. This works with Apple AirPlay 2 too.

INCLUDED ACCESSORIES: Remote control (with battery), power cord, wall mount bracket, quick start guide, World Wide Warranty leaflet. Scroll down on this product page for downloadable Manual and Quick Start Guide

title: ULTIMEA 4.1ch Sound Bar for Smart TV with Dolby Atmos, 2-in-1 Bluetooth 5.3 Soundbar for TV with Subwoofer, 280W Peak Power, 3 EQ Modes TV Soundbar, Bass Boost, HDMI eARC, Apollo S60 Detachable Series
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: With Dolby Atmos Elevate TV Sound: Craft multi-dimensional soundscape for immersive entertainment. Built-in DSP transforms stereo into 4.1 channels, delivering dynamic audio depth. When connected to Dolby decoding devices, this soundbar turns your space into a home cinema, providing heightened virtual 3D sound realism.

Versatile and Space-Saving Shape: The soundbar's detachable design allows you to assemble it in a variety of styles to fit the layout and atmosphere of your room. The split design saves space while the unique 7° tilt design enriches the soundstage with exclusive details.

Wired Subwoofer with Enhanced Bass: This 4.1ch soundbar with subwoofer reproduces a balanced sound with built-in 4 full range drivers, bringing richer bass and crisper treble. This dolby atmos soundbar has an extra 7.2L large-volume wired subwoofer that enables the diaphragm's amplitude to reach 15mm, achieving a more robust bass.

Personalized Sound Experience: Elevate your audio with 3 EQ modes designed for music, movie, and game. Ultimea exclusive "BassMX" enriches the low frequencies, enabling adjustable bass for the enhanced bass effect. All modes are easily accessible with a touch of a button on the EQ settings.

Upgraded Integrated DSP Chip: Apollo S60 soundbar can correct deviations in the sound's time axis, play precise panning position and enhanced soundstage, and perform subtle adjustment in tonal balance. This sound bar elevates driver's audio quality, ensuring all sound is heard exactly as it was intended.

Seamless Connectivity: The Apollo S60 sound bar for tv has wired and wireless dual connection options, including HDMI in/eARC, Optical, AUX, and USB ports (all cables included). Bluetooth 5.3 technology ensures a faster connection speed and a coverage range of up to 49 feet.

Lossless Audio Transmission: HDMI-eARC owns 37Mbps bandwidth, surpassing HDMI ARC's 1Mbit/s. With advanced audio transmission, Apollo S60 supports high-resolution, Dolby Atmos multi-channel audio effect. Automatic audio-video sync ensures perfect harmony between sound and visuals. (Apollo S60 doesn't support decoding DTS)

title: VIZIO Elevate SE 5.1.2 Soundbar, Wireless Subwoofer, Surround Sound w/Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, Bluetooth Speaker - SL512X-0806 (New, 2024 Model)
inStockText: In Stock  Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Reach the summit of 360-degree sound powered with Dolby Atmos through two auto-rotating speakers. Combined with two surround speakers and a wireless subwoofer, the Elevate system presents a deep and dynamic sound stage. Easily connect to your TV with the included HDMI cable, stream music from a mobile device via Bluetooth, and download the VIZIO mobile app for enhanced soundbar control using your smartphone. Soundbar remote control not included.
features: Receive the latest product updates and adjust advanced soundbar settings by downloading the VIZIO mobile app for your Android or iOS device (A VIZIO Account is required.) Soundbar remote control not included.

When Dolby Atmos and DTS:X content is detected, built-in adaptive height speakers automatically rotate up, reflecting sound off the ceiling for a thrilling cinematic experience in the comfort of your own home.
Clean, modern design featuring premium fabric, rotating aluminum elements and exposed side ports with customizable LED light delivers the signature Elevate look.
The HDMI eARC connection unlocks the highest-quality audio and allows you to control the soundbar with your TV remote. (HDMI eARC Output only.)

QuickFit, only from VIZIO, eliminates the gap between this soundbar and select VIZIO TVs for a seamless setup. Use the included thumbscrews to attach this soundbar to your TV in three simple steps, no tools needed!

title: Denon DHT-S316 Home Theater Soundbar System with Wireless Subwoofer | Virtual Surround Sound Technology | Wall-Mountable | Bluetooth Compatibility | Smart & Slim-Profile | Black
inStockText: In Stock  Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Transform any TV into a home entertainment center with the Denon DHT-S316. The low-visibility, wall-mountable sound bar features high-fidelity sound with two-way speakers and a wireless subwoofer. Denon Virtual Surround technology creates a powerful, realistic home theater experience through Dolby Digital, DTS Decoding and the Denon-proprietary Dialogue Enhancer for crystal clear dialogue at any volume. With a low-profile design and 2" height it fits most spaces and won’t block your TV’s bottom edge or IR remote sensor. Easily connect your TV to the HDMI (with Audio Return Channel) with the included HDMI cable. An Optical input allows for connecting an additional device. Wirelessly pair your Bluetooth capable devices to the Denon DHT-S316 and stream your favorite music easily.
features: LET YOUR TV COME TO LIFE – Equipped with dual 1.25" x 4.4" mid-range drivers, detailed crisp 1" tweeters and Dolby DTS, you will IMMERSE YOURSELF IN VIRTUAL SURROUND SOUND AT HOME WITH THEATER-QUALITY AUDIO

HEAR EVERY WORD WITH DIALOGUE ENHANCER – Denon brings to you an intelligent way of enhancing dialogues that makes them sound crystal clear without having to adjust the volume. Even the most complex audio tracks will now be loud and clear

LOW PROFILE DESIGN THAT FITS MOST SPACES – At just under 2" tall, the sound bar fits below the TV allowing uninterrupted viewing and won't block the IR remote sensor. Place it on a shelf or wall-mount it using the included mounting template

SINGLE CABLE HDMI CONNECTIVITY WITH ARC – Connect your TV to Blu-Ray, gaming console or any audio source using the optical digital input or the HDMI port via Audio Return Channel (HDMI & optical cable included). It's convenient and straightforward
ENJOY WIRELESS MUSIC STREAMING from your favorite streaming apps such as Amazon Music, Pandora, Spotify, TuneIn, and others through the built-in Bluetooth technology

With its 100-year legacy & Japanese precision technology, Denon BRINGS PURITY OF SOUND AND JOY TO YOUR LIFE. Immerse yourself in multi-dimensional audio and Hi-Fi surround sound with this soundbar & subwoofer for an exceptional home entertainment system

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Perfectly for 32-55 inches TVs. 
The LED display automatically dims without operation for 15 seconds, and the LED display can be switched on and off freely. 
The package comes with wall-mounted screws and indicator strips, which are convenient for you to install on the wall. 
The remote can control the sound bar remotely, with more comprehensive functions and more comfortable use; the buttons include main function operations, giving you one more choice. 
* Not compatible with third-party remotes. 
Compatible with your smart TVs, traditional TVs, 4k TVs, computer, projector, phone, tablet and so on. 
Not compatible with HDMI-ARC. 
* Please change TV audio output to PCM (or SPDIF and optical) and external speaker, otherwise you will get cracking noise or no sound. 
1 * Sound Bar (L16 * D3.6 * H2.9 IN) 
1 * Power Adapter 
1 * Remote Control (without batteries) 
1 * 3.5mm to 3.5mm Audio Cable 
1 * Optical Cable 
1 * User's Manual 
1 * Wall Mounting Template 
2 * Mount Screws 
FAQ: 
Q：Can this sound bar be charged? 
A：No, this sound bar is DC adapter powered, not battery powered. 
Q：Can I use it with my headphones? 
A：No, it is not compatible with headphones. 
Q：How do I use TV remote to control the soundbar? 
A：The IR code of the remote control is not compatible with universal remotes and TV remotes. 
Q：It dose not work or no sound. 
A：Please follow the Setup Tips or Manual to install it step by step, if this issue does not be fixed, please send email to us, we will help to deal with it without 24 hours. 
Q：Why does the sound still seem very low even when both the audio source and sound bar are turned up to maximum volume? 
A：Please first check whether the sound source has volume protection set. You need to disable the volume protection function to reach the maximum volume. 
Use Tips: 
1, For Optical (SPDIF) connection, please change your TV audio output to optical or external speaker, change the audio format setting to PCM and make sure the protective caps at the ends of the optical cable are removed before plugging it in. 
2, Sound bars for TV does not support Dolby and DTS, please kindly disable Dolby and DTS on your TV, Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube, and other streaming video apps. 
3, The USB interface of the sound bar is only suitable for playing audio from the U disk and updating the firmware, cannot supply power to the sound bar. The AUX port cannot be used as a headphone jack. 
4, Please kindly send email to us if there is any issue, we will help you deal with it without 24 hours.

title: Polk Audio React Sound Bar, Dolby & DTS Virtual Surround Sound, Next Gen Alexa Voice Engine with Calling & Messaging Built-in, Expandable to 5.1 with Matching React Subwoofer & SR2 Surround Speakers
inStockText: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.  Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: The Polk React Series is the newest series within Polk’s highly successful sound bar lineup. Developed by legendary speaker designers, elevate your home entertainment with Polk React Sound Bar that connects to virtually any TV. This stunning six-driver virtual surround sound speaker fills any room with Dolby & DTS surround sound without the need to add any additional speakers. With sound unbelievably crisp and dialogues crystal clear, thanks to Polk’s patented Voice Adjust Technology, you will never miss a dialogue or a beat of your favorite movies, songs, or videos, or while streaming endlessly over the internet. The React Series features Amazon Alexa Built-in, allowing you to control elements of your sound bar with your voice while adding Alexa functionality to your living room without any additional Alexa hardware. React enjoys the deepest Alexa integration in the sound bar category, letting you reach out to your loved ones in US, Mexico or Canada through Alexa Calling and Messaging, quick and easy. Complete the React series and build a 5.1 channel setup by pairing this soundbar with the React Wireless Sub and the SR2 Surround Speakers for an immersive, unforgettable home theater experience from this small yet powerful sound system.
features: A LOW-PROFILE SOUNDBAR WITH BIG, DETAILED HOME AUDIO SOUND - 3D virtual surround and a slim low-profile design that does not block your TV or remote's sensor, the new Polk React Sound Bar brings out the best from your existing TV.Waterproof : No

GREAT SOUND FOR VIRTUALLY ANY TV - Featuring a 6-driver array with (2) 3.8" x 2.7" mid-range drivers, (2) 1" tweeters and (2) 4.3" x 3.9" passive radiators, enjoy room-filling, immersive Dolby & DTS virtual surround sound without any additional speakers

MASSIVE ALEXA INTEGRATION - Play the same music across rooms, or different ones on each device, with full voice-control compatibility. Control Smart Home Devices. Use Alexa Calling and Messaging to US, Canada and Mexico - all from your sound bar

CLEAR & CRISP DIALOGUES - Polk's Proprietary Voice Adjust Technology adjusts the voice levels from the sound bar, so you hear every word, loud and clear. For sound optimized by content-type, use the one-button presets for movie, music and night mode

STREAM UNLIMITED MUSIC - Connect your smartphone, tablet or other compatible devices for direct streaming or use popular streaming services like Spotify, Pandora, TuneIn, and more to enjoy countless hours of music and videos to your liking

VERSATILE COMPATIBILITY - Features (1) HDMI ARC output, (1) Optical Audio Input, and (1) USB-A to play music from various sources. The setup is simple and frustration-free so you can start enjoying your music out of the box

BUILD A 5.1 CHANNEL SOUND SYSTEM with the FULL REACT FAMILY - For big, bold and impactful sound, add the optional SR2 wireless surround speakers and/or Polk React wireless sub with this Sound Bar to create a well-rounded home setup - no extra wires needed

title: PHILIPS B5106 2.0-Channel Soundbar with HDMI ARC Support, Roku TV Ready, Black
inStockText: Only 4 left in stock (more on the way).  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Welcome to better TV sound: Thundering explosions. Crystal clear dialogue. Philips TAB5106 delivers exceptional performance while making it easy to control the volume using your TV remote. Every movie you watch and every soundtrack you love will sound clearer, deeper, closer, and you can use the three preset audio modes to make your music more distinct. The ultra-modern trapezoid shape is designed to fit into any home setting. You can mount it on a wall with the included wall brackets, or slide it discreetly under the TV. The setup is also extremely simple, with HDMI ARC, audio-in and optical inputs. The Roku TV Ready badge means that this soundbar will work seamlessly with Roku TV, with easy access to sound settings and compatibility with your Roku remote.
features: STEP UP YOUR TV SOUND: This 60W soundbar will make everything you love sound better. Pick from three preset modes to make voices, music, and movies more distinct.
WORKS SEAMLESSLY WITH ROKU TV: Roku TV Ready means you'll enjoy a smoother setup, easy access to sound settings, and compatibility with your Roku remote when connecting this soundbar to your Roku TV.
CONNECT ALL YOUR FAVORITE SOURCES: Pair the soundbar with your smartphone, laptop, or tablet for bigger sound. You can also connect a wired music source via audio-in.

ONE REMOTE IS ALL YOU NEED: The days of hunting for multiple remotes are over. This soundbar connects to your TV via HDMI ARC, allowing you to control soundbar volume with the same remote you use for your TV.

DESIGNED TO BE PART OF YOUR HOME: The unique geometric design is simple yet distinctive. You can place it on your TV stand, the wall, or any flat surface. Wall brackets are integrated for easy mounting.
INCLUDED IN THE BOX: Power cord, 2 x AAA batteries, power adapter, remote control, wall mount bracket, quick start guide, warranty card
Power source type: corded electric

inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.

description: Yamaha – 2.1 Ch SR-C30A Compact Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer and Bluetooth – Black Good on space and on bass. Packed with virtual 3D surround sound, Clear Voice and Adaptive Low Volume technologies inside a footprint made for versatility. A wireless compact subwoofer wants to be heard but not seen – place it vertically or horizontally. Bluetooth and easy setup options make listening simple. Wall-mount for even more space-saving possibilities.
features: Meet the SR-C30A compact sound bar with compact subwoofer: a compact duo that strives to fit in, not stand out. The sound bar measures a mere 23” wide and the wireless compact subwoofer can be positioned vertically or horizontally for endless placement possibilities.
We know size matters. But we’re not sacrificing sound. The C30 is packed with virtual 3D surround sound, Clear Voice and Adaptive Low Volume technologies inside a footprint made for versatility.

The SR-C30A has 4 sound modes to match your content and your mood: Standard, Stereo, 3D Movie and Game. 3D Movie creates realistic virtual surround sound. Game mode makes your video games sound amazing and is tuned for near-field listening .
Bluetooth streaming makes the SR-C30A perfect for your music and podcasts

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
ACE OF SPACE 
Make the most of your movies and the most of your space with our newest sound bar, the SR-C30A. We took a 23-inch sound bar and added a compact wireless subwoofer. The result? Phenomenal sound and rich bass flexible enough to fit almost anywhere! 
Small on Space, Big on Tech 
Adaptive Low Volume 
Our New Adaptive Low Volume technology maintains the richness of sound even at low volumes. It’s a win-win for late-night binge sessions when the rest of the house is asleep 
Clear Voice 
Enhances vocal frequency range, ensuring you can hear spoken dialogue in your movies and TV shows. 
Sound Modes 
Customize your experience with four sound modes. 
3D Movie Mode 
3D Movie Mode creates virtual 3D surround sound creates lifelike sound for all of your favorite TV shows, movies and games. 
Going Sideways 
The SR-C30A compact sound bar is designed to fit any space without sacrificing sound or specs. The wireless subwoofer is a slim 6” wide and 13” deep, giving you plenty of options for placement. For even more flexibility, place the subwoofer horizontally! 
Fits Your Life 
Bluetooth Multipoint 
Allows quick, easy switching between two smartphones or tablets. 
Game Out Loud! 
Game mode makes your video games sound amazing and is tuned for near-field listening (the C30A is the perfect fit gaming battlestations!). 
App Control 
Your phone is also your remote with the free Sound Bar Remote app. 
Simple Setup 
Simple setup with one cable. HDMI ARC, Optical or Aux - your choice!

inStockText: Only 16 left in stock - order soon.  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Elevate your entertainment setup with the Polk MagniFi Max AX advanced performing 5.1.2 channel sound bar for TV, surround sound speakers, and home theater audio so you hear clear, crisp sound from every angle, even overhead, plus it includes a wireless Polk Subwoofer (10") that adds deep, rumbling bass. With left/right tweeters and woofers, this TV sound bar with wireless subwoofer delivers a super wide soundstage, optimized to make your movies, TV, sports, and music sound exceptional. Features patented SDA surround technology for a wider, more immersive listening experience and Voice Adjust technology for crystal clear dialogue. This Dolby Atmos soundbar features Night Mode, which allows you to lower the bass while increasing VoiceAdjust with just a button, so you can hear every word without raising the master volume. Supports 4K/60 fps HDMI, HDR10, and Dolby Vision for realistic video quality. Built-in Wi-Fi with Chromecast and Bluetooth technologies along with the preset sound modes lets you stream your favorite music instantly. Place the Polk Subwoofer anywhere in your living room, bedroom, or media room, or home theater and fill the room with high-impact multi-dimensional sound. To build a 7.1.2 surround sound setup, add Polk’s timbre matched SR2 wireless speakers.
features: A SUPER IMMERSIVE SOUND EXPERIENCE - MagniFi Max AX Soundbar features an 11-driver array with 2 up-firing drivers for virtual height effects, left/right tweeters & woofers & a dedicated center channel, delivering immersive sound & clear dialogues

CAPTIVATING SURROUND SOUND WITH POLK's PATENTED SDA 3D AUDIO TECHNOLOGY - This home theater system delivers certified Dolby Atmos and DTS:X cinematic surround sound with impactful bass & an expansive 3D soundstage for next-level music & movies experience

HEAR EVERY WORD CLEARLY - Polk's patented VoiceAdjust speech-clarifying technology works with MagniFi's integrated center channel speaker to bring up the voice levels without affecting the rest of the soundtrack. Enjoy clear dialogues and balanced audio

SOUNDBAR WITH SUBWOOFER SYSTEM - Includes a powerful plug-and-play 10" down-firing Wireless Subwoofer that connects instantly to the sound bar the moment you power it on. It delivers deep, effortless bass, at volume levels that are surprising for its size

COMPLETE WIRELESS HOME ENTERTAINMENT - Create a whole-home audio solution & enjoy high-quality music streaming directly from your smart TV or phone, tablet or computer via Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, AirPlay 2, Chromecast, Spotify Connect, and Alexa MRM

QUICKLY AND EASILY SETUP THE SOUNDBAR SYSTEM IN SECONDS using the Google Home app on your Android or iOS devices. This soundbar for TV & home theater systems connects in a jiffy. Includes a Polk soundbar remote to unlock MagniFi Max AX's full potential

NUMEROUS CONNECTION OPTIONS - (3) 4K HDMI inputs, (1) HDMI w/eARC output for connecting your smart TV and other devices, and an Optical port for Blu-Ray players. In addition, you can connect a multitude of devices using Bluetooth, USB, and the Internet

inStockText: Only 17 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock

description: The all-in-one JBL Bar 300 turns your movies, TV shows, and games into a true experience. MultiBeam™ and Dolby Atmos® technologies deliver 3D surround sound, while PureVoice technology optimizes voice clarity to ensure you never miss a word. Enjoy over 300 streaming services using AirPlay, Alexa MRM, or Chromecast built-in™.
features: Dolby Atmos and MultiBeam Surround Sound: Immerse yourself in theater-quality 3D surround sound. Hear extraordinary sound effects from everywhere in the room, without the need for extra surround speakers.

Built-In Wi-Fi with AirPlay, Alexa Multi-Room Music and Chromecast built-in: Get ready to explore. Access over 300 online music streaming services through AirPlay, Alexa MRM and Chromecast built-in. features: Fire TV Soundbar Plus – Elevate your audio with an all-in-one 3.1 soundbar that’s easy to set up. Featuring built-in bass, crisp dialogue, Dolby Atmos, and DTS:X.
Powerful sound with style – Take your entertainment to the next level with incredible sound, clarity, and depth packed into an all-in-one design.

Which devices are compatible with the Razer Leviathan V2 X? 
The Razer Leviathan V2 X can be connected via USB Audio Input to your PC. It can also be connected wirelessly via Bluetooth with your mobile phones and Nintendo Switch. 
How is the Razer Leviathan V2 X powered? 
The Razer Leviathan V2 X utilizes a USB Type C connection. The power of the soundbar will be dependent on the power delivered from the output source, whether it's a USB Type C wall outlet, PC, laptop, or monitor. 
How do I toggle audio between the Razer Leviathan V2 X and another device? 
On the Toggle PC Audio Devices panel within Razer Synapse, you will be able to set a secondary playback device that you can immediately switch audio with by pressing and holding the Source button on the Razer Leviathan V2 X.

items.text: Adjust settings such as volume, EQ and more with ease and convenience with the wireless control pod. Compatible with Razer Leviathan V2 X.

items.name: Which devices are compatible with the Razer Leviathan V2 X?
items.text: The Razer Leviathan V2 X can be connected via USB Audio Input to your PC. It can also be connected wirelessly via Bluetooth with your mobile phones and Nintendo Switch.

items.name: How is the Razer Leviathan V2 X powered?
items.text: The Razer Leviathan V2 X utilizes a USB Type C connection. The power of the soundbar will be dependent on the power delivered from the output source, whether it's a USB Type C wall outlet, PC, laptop, or monitor.

items.name: How do I toggle audio between the Razer Leviathan V2 X and another device?
items.text: On the Toggle PC Audio Devices panel within Razer Synapse, you will be able to set a secondary playback device that you can immediately switch audio with by pressing and holding the Source button on the Razer Leviathan V2 X.

It supports 4K video quality, Dolby Vision and HDR for an extraordinary cinematic experience on your 4K TV with breathtakingly beautiful visuals and detailed imaging. description: Denon DHT-S218 Full-Range Dolby Atmos SoundbarIntroducing the Denon DHT-S218 2.1 Ch. Soundbar for unparalleled home theater entertainment. Delivering premium sound quality, this sleek soundbar is equipped with Dolby Atmos technology, providing an immersive 3D cinematic audio experience. Featuring two powerful built-in down-firing subwoofers, along with dual midrange drivers and tweeters, it ensures exceptional audio performance, bringing your favorite movies and music to life with clarity and depth.Stream your content wirelessly with this Denon Soundbar. Its built-in down-firing subwoofers deliver bass and multi-dimensional audio, while Bluetooth Low Energy (LE) Audio enables streaming of high-quality sound from your smartphone or tablet. Enjoy connectivity and sound quality, allowing you to immerse yourself in your entertainment content with remarkable detail.Customize your listening experience with the Denon Dialog Enhancer and four sound modes - pure, movie, music, and night mode. Pure mode eliminates surround sound processing for a clear and unaltered music listening experience, providing pristine audio quality that lets you enjoy your favorite tunes to the fullest. With advanced connectivity options, including multi-pairing and multi-point Bluetooth capabilities, as well as 4K UHD HDMI with eARC for streaming from your smart TV, the DHT-S218 Soundbar offers an unmatched entertainment experience that integrates into your home environment.
features: PREMIUM SOUND BAR - The Denon DHT-S218 2.1 Channel Soundbar delivers 3D cinematic audio with Dolby Atmos technology, while its 2 powerful built-in, down-firing subwoofers, and dual midrange drivers & tweeters ensure an unparalleled home theater setup

WIRELESS STREAMING WITH ENHANCED AUDIO - Get improved bass & multi-dimensional audio hassle-free with the built-in down-firing subwoofers, and easily stream with Bluetooth Low Energy (LE) Audio for higher quality sound from your smartphone or tablet

DIALOGUE ENHANCEMENT - Denon Dialog Enhancer sharpens dialogue clarity and makes them sound crystal clear without having to adjust the overall volume. Select from 4 sound modes – pure, movie, music, and night mode - for a custom listening experience

PURE SOUND QUALITY - Pure mode on the DHT-S218 soundbar eliminates surround sound processing & other adjusted characteristics for a clear music listening experience. Enjoy pristine audio quality tailored for the pure enjoyment of your favorite tunes

ADVANCED CONNECTIVITY – Link multiple smartphones, tablets, and laptops with multi-pairing, and switch between Bluetooth devices with multi-point. Stream apps from your smart TV to the soundbar with 4K UHD HDMI with eARC via the included HDMI cable

title: ULTIMEA 5.1Ch Sound Bar with Dolby Atmos, 410W Peak Power, Surround Sound System for TV, Sound Bar for Smart TV with Subwoofer, Surround and Bass Adjustable Home Theater, Poseidon D60, 2024 Version
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: Dolby Atmos Creates an Immersive 3D Soundscape: Elevate your home entertainment with the Ultimea soundbar featuring Dolby Atmos. Unlike standard Dolby Digital and Dolby Audio, Dolby Atmos delivers a three-dimensional sound experience that makes you feel right in the middle of the action. With Ultimea, you’ll experience the same immersive sound quality as in a top-notch theater.

True 5.1 Surround Sound System: The Ultimea soundbar is engineered with a full 5.1 surround sound setup, including three main channels for crystal-clear dialogue, two surround speakers, and a powerful wireless subwoofer. Perfect for movie nights, gaming, or music sessions, this setup ensures every sound effect and dialogue is crisp and enveloping. Whether you're enjoying a blockbuster film or an intense video game, the sound bar’s Dolby Atmos technology makes it feel like the audio is coming from all directions, enhancing your overall experience.

Flexible Surround Sound with Adjustable Speakers: With its two wired surround speakers connected via a 20-foot cable, the Ultimea soundbar offers flexible placement options to suit your room layout. Whether you prefer a more immersive sound experience in a spacious living room or a focused surround effect in a smaller space, you can adjust the speaker placement to fit your needs. Plus, with easy controls on the remote, you can effortlessly adjust the surround and bass levels to match your preference, creating the perfect audio environment for any occasion.

Dolby Atmos Advanced Decoding Technology: Enjoy the full benefits of Dolby Atmos with Ultimea's soundbar, compatible with Blu-ray players, streaming services like Netflix and Prime Video, and more. If your content is Dolby Atmos-enabled, you’ll experience top-tier audio decoding that enhances your viewing experience with rich, dynamic sound. The exclusive BASSMX technology further boosts low frequencies, delivering powerful, pulse-pounding bass that makes every explosion, footstep, and musical note come alive.

Highest-Level Audio Transmission with HDMI-eARC: The included HDMI-eARC cable supports advanced audio transmission, providing high-resolution and Dolby Atmos multi-channel audio effects. This ensures you receive lossless sound quality that brings out the finest details in your favorite movies and shows. Note: While the Ultimea soundbar supports advanced Dolby Atmos decoding, it does not support DTS.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Bluetooth 5.0 
With Bluetooth 5.0 Technology enabled, You can use your smartphone, tablet or other compatible devices to wirelessly stream music to your Sound Bar 
Multiple Connections 
You can choose the wired connections including HDMI(arc), Optical, and AUX, compatible with your TVs, projectors, computers, smartphones, tablet, PCs, PS4, DVDs and other devices(HDMI, RCA Audio cable included) 
One button to Turn Off the LED Light 
If blindingly bright status LEDs are keeping you up at night, Press the "INDICATOR" button on the remote control to disable the LED light. 
Clear Dialogue and More 
Specially tuned dialogue mode makes voices more crisp and clear. There are some other sound enhancement features available, too, including EQ presets like 'Movie', 'Music', and '3D'. You can use to enhance your sound, based on what you prefer or what your media requires 
Happy Gaming 
The slim form factor of this soundbar allows it to subtly tuck under your TV without wasting much space, while still producing the spatial, 3D audio experience you’re after. 
Detachable Design 
1. Plug the audio connector into the audio input port on another main unit 
2. Merge the two main units 
3. Twist clockwise about 20 degrees until it locks securely 
Note: The soundbar will not work when split

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
PUXINAT 2.2 CH SOUND BAR--Bring Theater Experience Home 
The Puxinat Bluetooth 5.0 Sound Bar upgrades its 2.1 channel to 2.2 and provides crystal clear, full-range, top-notch immersive sound experience with its dual sub-woofers and tweeters. 32inch compact and sleek design fits perfectly with different TVs and various home styles. 
3D Stereo Surround Sound and Space Saving Detachable Mode 
Puxinat 2 in 1 detachable sound bar caters to the new demand of speaker fans and launches this up-to-date version of sound bar to our customers. Sitting nicely on either side of your TV, this sound bar creates 360 degrees stereo surround sound and let you immerse in room-filling sound effect. A great bonus added to its stunning sound quality. 
Latest Bluetooth 5.0 Connection 
Built-in Bluetooth 5.0 technology enables streaming your favorite music or talk shows directly from your smartphone, tablet or other compatible devices. Faster transmission speed, happier auditory feast. 
USB Stick Connection 
Puxinat Sound bar is featured with unique USB port. Plug your USB stick to Puxinat Sound Bar, your favorite music is on the go. 
Integrated Remote Control 
Wireless remote control can let you easily set up the Bluetooth sound bar connection status and adjust the sound effect like 3D, treble or bass. switch the functions like music, movie, news, game, HiFi or night modes, etc. Remote control distances up to 49 feet in open areas to control sound bar. Besides, bass and treble adjustable buttons on the remote control. 
TV HDMI(ARC) Connection 
Please connect your sound bar to the HDMI(ARC) port ONLY when setting it up via your TV HDMI port. If there is no sound coming out, please switch your TV sound setting to PCM audio output. Or please turn off the DOLBY audio/DTS function of your displaying apps. 
Choose the Installation Way as You Like

title: Roku Wireless Speakers (for Roku Streambars or Roku TV),Black 2 Count (Pack of 1)
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock  In Stock

description: Roku Wireless Speakers are the easy way to upgrade the sound of your Roku TV™ or add immersive surround sound to your Roku audio system. Two speakers work in harmony to create a rich soundscape with room-filling audio, crystal clear dialogue, and dynamic bass. You can even combine two sets of Roku Wireless Speakers with your Roku audio system for ultra-immersive full surround sound. There’s no extra remote to juggle—Roku Wireless Speakers work with your current Roku remote and wirelessly pair to your Roku TV, Roku® Streambar®, Roku® Streambar® Pro, or Roku Smart Soundbar in just a few quick steps. If you already have a Roku® Streambar®, Roku® Streambar® Pro, or Roku Smart Soundbar, you can add Roku Wireless Speakers behind your couch for immersive surround sound and Roku Wireless Subwoofer (sold separately). For a full surround sound setup, you can add two sets of Roku Wireless Speakers, two speakers in the front by your TV along with your current Roku audio device and two in the rear behind your couch. If you have a Roku TV, start with a set of Roku Wireless Speakers for premium sound as front speakers. You can then easily add heart-pounding bass with Roku Wireless Subwoofer (sold separately).
features: Add cinematic sound to your Roku TV or immersive surround sound to your Roku audio system (Requires Roku TV, Roku Streambar or Roku Streambar Pro – sold separately) Only works with Roku TV or Roku Audio

Powerful, premium audio: With high frequencies and dynamic bass, Roku Wireless Speakers are meticulously engineered to deliver full, clear sound and crisp dialogue with seamless audio/video sync to your Roku TV or Roku audio system

Be immersed in your TV: Experience room-filling audio that moves with the action, conversations like you’re in the room, and soundscapes that transport you to another world—it's cinematic sound for your entertainment
Elevate your music: Listen to your music come to life with clear highs and volume without distortion—simply tune into your favorite music channels or stream via Bluetooth

Fine-tune your sound: Easily boost the volume of voices with Speech Clarity, lower loud commercials for consistent sound with Volume Leveling, and enjoy your TV without waking the house using Night Mode
Easy wireless setup: No need to run cables across your living room—just plug them into power and wirelessly connect them to your Roku TV, Roku Streambar, Roku Streambar Pro, or Roku Smart Soundbar
Bluetooth streaming: Stream music, podcasts, and more from a Bluetooth connected device to open up a world of sound
Automatic software updates: Get the most up-to-date software for your speakers without even thinking about it, so they’ll always have the best possible sound and latest features
Surround sound your way: Easily combine one or two sets of Roku Wireless Speakers to build your own full surround sound system

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Multiple Input Options 
The soundbar LED lights up in different colors when connected with didffernt cables. 
Optical- purple color (please remove the plastic caps on both tips of the cable before use)
HDMI(ARC)-white color (only when a HDMI-ARC cable plugged in TV, this mode can be choosed)
Bluetooth-blue color
AUX-green color
Fits Different Sizes of TV 
This 24-inch soundbar is built with a detachable design, which is easy to detach, pack and move.
The size is also designed for most TVs, from 24 inch to 42 inch TV. It works great for a small living room, bedroom, kitchen and garage.
Dual Controls 
Buttons control
(Power On/Off, Volume+, Volume-, Mode Selection) 
Remote control
1. You can use AUX Boost to increase volume under AUX mode; 
2. Press BT for 2 seconds to discconect blueooth connection; 
3. There are even 3 preset sound effects to choose from); 
4.The IR code of remote control is not compatible with universal or TV remotes. Free replacement remotes can be provided lifetime 
To avoid silent or noisy output from the speakers, For optical /ARC connection, please change your TV audio output to optical /ARC and change the audio format setting to PCM and disable the Dolby /DTS on your TV, Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube or other streaming video APPs
Frequently Asked Questions 
Q: When I use APPs such as Netflix on the TV, the soundbar has no sound.
A: The soundbar does not support Dolby and DTS, please kindly disable the Dolby and DTS on your TV audio settings or streaming video APPs like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube. 
Q: How to quickly disconnect the current Bluetooth device connected with Soundbar?
A: Press and hold the BT button on remote /M button on soundbar for about 2 seconds to disconnect the current Bluetooth device. 
Q: My dog chewed my remote, how do l get a replacement remote?
A: We provide free replacement soundbar accessories, including remotes. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us. 
Q: How do I use TV remote to control the soundbar?
A: The IR code of the remote control is not compatible with universal remotes and TV remotes.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Multiple Connection Options 
AUX-the soundbar led lights up in green color; 3.5mm-RCA audio cable included;
Optical-the soundbar led lights up in purple color, optical cable included;
Bluetooth-the soundbar led lights up in blue color
Remote and Buttons Control 
The code of remote control is not compatible with universal or TV remotes; 
Batteries are not included
Bass is adjustable through sub+ or sub-;
Free remotes and accessories provided lifetime
Important Notice 
To eliminate stactic noise under optical mode, please set TV audio output format to PCM, and disable dolby and DTS on both TV and video streaming apps
Use Tips: 
If the soundbar has delayed audio, this can be fixed via the audio settings on your TV.
Does not support Dolby and DTS, please kindly disable the Dolby and DTS on your TVs, Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube, and other streaming video APPs.
For audio cable connection, please make sure to plug the audio cable into a connector on your TV labeled Line OUT or Audio OUT, not Line IN or Audio IN. Please kindly note that the audio cable is connected to the TV audio output and the soundbar audio input. And you can double-click the AUX boost button on the remote control to restore the volume.
Soundbar does not have USB interface, the soundbar can be connected to your computer through the AUX interface. The AUX port cannot be used as a headphone jack.
We provide replace remote control/Auxiliary cable/Optical cable for free. If you need to, please contact our after-sales service team. (Remote control is not compatible with universal or TV remotes). 
Please kindly send email to us if there is any issue, we will help you deal with it without 24 hours.
The sound bar is compatible with the Fire TV remote control. If needed, additional remotes compatible with Roku box or Roku TV can be provided upon request.

title: Hisense AX5125H 5.1.2Ch Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer, 500W, Dolby Atmos, Bluetooth 5.3, EzPlay, 4K HDMI Pass Through, Roku TV Ready, DTS:X, HDMI/AUX/ARC/Optical/USB, 7 EQ Modes
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Upgrade your audio experience with the AX5125H 5.1.2 channel soundbar with a wireless subwoofer and wireless rear speakers. The AX5125H’s 500 watts of sound fills the room with a 9- speaker array that also projects sound overhead, making the most of Dolby Atmos. The dedicated wireless rear channel speakers create an immersive, true surround sound experience. 7 audio enhancement modes, including movie, music, game, news, sport, night and AI mode, optimize sound specifically to the content or time of day. And, eARC provides a simple one cable connection with the included HDMI cable. Bluetooth audio makes it easy to connect your phone, tablet or laptop wireless to enjoy music and more.
features: 5.1.2 SURROUND SOUND: 9 speakers built into the soundbar. Left and right front channel, center channel, left and right rear surround channel, surround the listener in 3D audio for room filling sound that delivers a true Dolby Atmos experience.

WIRELESS SUBWOOFER: A wireless subwoofer delivers the robust low-end frequencies that punctuate your favorite movies, music, and games, without any messy wires. You’ll feel the “boom” while the two front-facing speakers project bright, clear high- and mid-range frequencies.
QUICK TOUCH EQ MODES: Get the best audio performance from music, movies, and news with a simple touch of the remote with 7 preset EQ settings.

DOLBY ATMOS: Whether you’re gaming, watching your favorite movie or show, or listening to that new track on repeat, Dolby Atmos enhances the entertainment you love across all of your devices. It goes beyond ordinary listening by transporting you with the breakthrough spatial sound experience that draws you in deeper, so you hear and feel more.

ROKU TV READY: As Roku TV Ready device, the Hisense AX5125H Soundbar is fully compatible with any Roku TV through the HDMI (eARC) connection. You can even use the Roku TV remote to control both the TV and soundbar for easier setup and better navigation experience.

WIRELESS REAR SPEAKERS: While some soundbar packages can create a “virtual” surround sound experience by manipulating frequencies, the AX5125H comes with a pair of dedicated wireless rear speakers that truly immerses the listener and make set up a breeze.
WIRELESS MUSIC STREAMING: Wireless Bluetooth technology easily connects to smart devices so the listener can enjoy their favorite playlists from their phone or other wireless devices.

EASY CONNECTIVITY: With HDMI (eARC), the Hisense AX5125H can connect to your TV through a single HDMI cable (included) connect wirelessly via Bluetooth, and control both with one remote. You’ll be enjoying better TV sound in minutes.

title: LG S95TR 9.1.5-Channel OLED evo TV Matching Soundbar with Rear Surround Speakers, Dolby Atmos, Wow Orchestra, WOWCAST Built-in with Wireless Dolby Atmos, Wireless Subwoofer (2024 New Model)
inStockText: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Get ready to experience a new dimension in premium home theater sound. An impressive 9.1.5 channel configuration—featuring 5 up-firing speakers, plus wireless subwoofer and rear speakers—delivers an immersive audio experience that leaves no sound behind. Enhanced by Dolby Atmos¹ and DTS:X² technologies, the S95TR projects a 3D dome of realistic audio that fills even the largest rooms. ¹Dolby, Dolby Atmos and the double-D symbol are registered trademarks of Dolby Laboratories. ²For DTS patents, see http://patents.dts.com. features: Premium 3-Dimensional Sound - Elevate your home theater sound to a new level with this premium 9.1.5-channel soundbar powered by Dolby Atmos and DTS:X technology.

Rear Speakers - Now there’s a surround sound system for rooms of all shapes and sizes. Our new up-firing rear speakers have true wireless connectivity—that means no special receiver needed. Not only do they deliver an immersive audio experience, they can be positioned anywhere and calibrated accordingly. These speakers only need to connect to an outlet—it’s literally plug and play.

Triple Up-Firing Speaker - Meet LG’s Dolby Atmos soundbar with triple up-firing channels, including an industry exclusive up-firing center channel that focuses on dialogue clarity. The soundbar delivers a wider and richer soundstage so you can enjoy the most immersive sound experience at home.

WOW Orchestra - Create the perfect harmony using the audio from your LG TV and LG Soundbar to produce the ultimate listening experience. Feel every detail of sound. Use the LG TV and LG Soundbar speakers at the same time while using one remote to adjust the settings interchangeably.

WOW Interface - Now, convenience is in your hand. Control your soundbar and your LG TV with one remote. Adjust the volume and audio settings, check the connection status and even select a sound mode on the screen, all from the TV remote.

WOWCAST Built-in with Wireless Dolby Atmos - Experience the power of Dolby Atmos and DTS:X surround sound without any visible wires. A new built-in experience that connects your LG TV and LG Soundbar wirelessly for a sleek look—with no lag or loss in audio quality.
Multi-Platform Support - Choose your go-to voice assistant like Google Assistant or Alexa, and control your favorite features like Chromecast, AirPlay 2 and more through your LG Soundbar.

Advanced Room Calibration - Get a richer, deeper and clearer surround sound experience, with no sound delay, as well as flexibility in how you set up your rear speakers. Using the built-in microphone, your soundbar precisely measures the dimensions of the room and detects your rear speaker location. AI then analyzes this spatial information and optimizes audio settings accordingly.

Immersive 3D Spatial Sound - Push the boundary of the entertainment experience. Step into the scene and feel like you are a part of the action with Immersive 3D Spatial Sound—a virtual dome that delivers a more immersive cinematic experience.
VRR/ALLM - Sound that keeps up with an instantaneous response time, allowing you to enjoy a gaming experience that is smooth and lag-free with a passthrough refresh rate up to 120Hz.

Previous page
Higher dimensional audio 
Elevate your home theater sound to a new level with this premium 9.1.5-channel soundbar powered by Dolby Atmos¹ and DTS:X² technology. 
True wireless connectivity 
Our new rear surround speakers have wireless connectivity—no special receiver needed to deliver an immersive audio experience. 
Fired up 
Meet LG’s Dolby Atmos¹ soundbar with triple up-firing channels, including an industry exclusive up-firing center channel for dialogue clarity. 
Enhance your game play 
Sound that keeps up with an instantaneous response time, allowing you to enjoy a gaming experience that is smooth and lag-free with a passthrough refresh rate up to 120Hz. 
Next page
WOW Orchestra 
Create the perfect harmony using the audio from your LG TV and LG Soundbar to produce the ultimate listening experience. Feel every detail of sound. Use the LG TV and LG Soundbar speakers at the same time³ while using one remote to adjust the settings interchangeably. 
WOW Interface 
Now, convenience is in your hand. Control your soundbar and your LG TV with one remote³. Adjust the volume and audio settings, check the connection status and even select a sound mode on the screen, all from the TV remote. 
WOWCAST Built-in with Wireless Dolby Atmos 
Experience the power of Dolby Atmos¹ and DTS:X² surround sound without any visible wires, lag or loss in audio quality. 
Enjoy HD music streaming services 
Use Wi-Fi to play high-quality music directly from the cloud to your soundbar ⁴,⁵. 
Say it, we'll play It

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Bose TV Speaker 
Hear your TV better. 
The Bose TV Speaker is a small soundbar that focuses on clarifying and elevating vocals and pronunciation, while delivering spacious and realistic audio performance. And a single connection has you ready in minutes. 
More clarity. 
Enable “dialogue mode” on the remote to analyze what you’re watching and further enhance speech, so you can hear and understand every word more clearly. 
More music. 
With Bluetooth compatibility, you can wirelessly stream your favorite music and podcasts. Press the Bluetooth button on the remote to pair your device. 
More Bass. 
Press the “BASS” button on the remote for some extra depth. Or expand your system by adding a wired Bose Bass Module for a more theater-quality experience. 
Bose TV Speaker 
Easy to set up. Easy to use. 
A single connection to the TV with an optical audio cable (included) or HDMI cable has you unboxed and ready in minutes. And with HDMI-CEC technology*, the Bose TV Speaker will automatically turn on when your TV does and respond to your current TV remote for volume changes. 
*Must be connected with an HDMI cable.

[𝐈𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐂𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝]: Enjoy a powerful 70W sound stage that immerses you in a true cinematic experience. Equipped with 4 drivers, turns flat TV audio into a captivating surround sound experience. Hear every whisper and sound explosion in vibrant stereo, enhancing your TV's audio performance.

[𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬]: Tailor your audio experience with 3 distinct equalizer modes: movie, music, and news. Whether you're watching a blockbuster, enjoying your favorite tunes, or catching up on the news, our soundbar delivers cinema-quality sound, crisp melodies, and clear dialogue to match your preferences.

[𝐒𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧]: Effortlessly connect with Bluetooth 5.0 for wireless convenience or use ARC, OPT, and AUX cables for a stable wired connection. I only receive 2 small speakers, is the real soundbar missing? 
No. Those 2 small "speakers" as you mentioned are actually 2 soundbars, which could be combined into 1 large soundbar or you could insert them separately to the bases. 
Is there any subwoofer included or any connector to hook up a subwoofer? 
No subwoofer/DEEP BASS. This soundbar focus on people need loud and stereo sound with limited budgets. If you have special needs for DEEP BASS, please skip this product. 
Why does streaming sound static? Does it support Netflix or Amazon Prime video? 
Please switch the sound setting to STEREO output when you use streaming. (in your app such as Netflix or TV setting) 
Why is there no sound? Why does the sound occasionally sound terrible? 
Note: Please set your TV sound setting to PCM mode - Different TV have different sound setting, please provide your TV model for specific setting process according to your TV model.

items.text:
Keep The Party Music Going
With up to 20 hours of battery life, this bluetooth party speaker is perfect for all day celebrations so your favorite party jams never have to end.

Built to Play Through Anything
No need to stress over rain drops or accidental drops, this dustproof and waterproof bluetooth speaker comes with an IP67 rating and is shock and rust resistant.

Power Up While You Vibe Out
If your phone battery starts to run low, simply plug it into the speaker’s USB-C port and use the built-in battery to keep the music bumping while you juice up.

Listen How You Like
The built-in AUX port means you can connect wired devices like turntables, CD players, or MP3 players to the boombox and keep the music playing, even without Bluetooth.

Complete Control With The Bose App
Want a perfectly dialed in party sound? Use the Bose app to control EQ settings like bass, mid-range, and treble or use it to check the speaker’s battery life.

title: Roku TV Wireless Soundbar, Soundbar Exclusively for RokuTV with Enhanced Stereo Sound, Clear Dialogue, and Simple Wireless Setup
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Easily upgrade the sound of your Roku TV with Roku TV Wireless Soundbar. Set up is simple—just plug it into power and place anywhere for clearer, louder TV sound. No extra cables. No extra clutter. Just great sound. Enjoy audio that’s in seamless sync with the picture on your Roku TV—exactly the way it should be—and hear every word of your entertainment with crisp, clear dialogue. Automatically lower the volume level for louder scenes and boost it for quieter ones, improve the clarity of voices, and even quiet loud commercials without lifting a finger. Need a streaming break? Rock out to your favorite tunes with vibrant, studio-quality sound from your favorite channels or a connected Bluetooth device. And for those moments that need an extra punch of power, you can easily expand your set up with a Roku Wireless Bass or Wireless Bass Pro, for deep, rich lows you can feel. Best of all, one remote is all you need to control your Roku TV, adjust the volume, and access sound settings. Take your Roku TV to the next level with Roku TV Wireless Soundbar. Because once you hear it, you’ll wonder how you ever lived without it.
features: Exclusively for Roku TV: Roku TV Wireless Soundbar is designed to work seamlessly with any Roku TV.
Hearing is believing: Upgrade your entertainment with enhanced stereo sound, crisp, clear dialogue, and boosted volume.
Simple sound settings: Automatically lower loud commercials, boost the volume of voices, and optimize the sound for night listening, all in one place.
Clutter-free setup: It’s easy to set up with your Roku TV—just plug it into power to get started. The wireless connection makes it a perfect fit for any setup.
Place it anywhere: Plug in your Roku TV Wireless Soundbar, then place it below your TV or wall mount it for your perfect setup.
Works with your remote: Roku TV Wireless Soundbar works with any Roku TV remote, so you don’t have to juggle remotes.
Audio/video sync: Experience sound that’s in seamless sync with the picture on your Roku TV.
Bluetooth streaming: Pair your phone to Roku TV Wireless Soundbar to enjoy your music in vibrant, studio-quality sound.
Automatic software updates: Your soundbar gets even better over time with regular updates, so it’s always working at its best.
Easily expandable: Want bigger sound? Add Roku Wireless Bass for rich lows you can feel. Roku Plus Series TVs users can also add Roku Wireless Speakers for immersive 4.1 surround sound.
