title: Definitive Technology ProCenter 1000 Compact Center Speaker (Black)
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Center-Channel Speakers
description: Product DescriptionDefinitive has always LED the industry with the best-sounding shielded center channels available. Optimum surround sound home theater reproduction places heavy demands on the center channel speaker, which in many respects is the main speaker in the system and often handles 50% or more of the program material. It is no place to compromise and settle for second best. Because of this, definitive pioneered the concept of full frequency range high-definition center-channel speakers. Definitive's center channels and C/L/RS are consistently rated as the best available, and have won numerous audio video Grand Prix center channel of the year Awards each and every year.From the Manufacturer The ProCenter 1000 is Definitive's mid-sized center speaker in the acclaimed ProCinema Series. A ProCenter 1000 along with four ProCenter 800s or ProMonitor 1000s and a matching ProSub makes a complete ProCinema system. All the components of the system are packed and sold separately allowing you to mix and match Pro Series components to build the system that best suits your needs.  Enjoy warm, life-like sound from a small center channel speaker High-definition Balanced Double Surround System technology drivers (available in black or white) Built-in foot allows for perfect angle adjustment. View larger  Don't let the ProCenter 1000's small size and affordable price fool you -- it is a remarkably sophisticated product with huge sound. The 1000 incorporates many of the same technologies as Definitive's top-of-the-line models including BDSS drivers, pure aluminum dome tweeters, and planar pressure coupled mid/bass radiators for home theater sound quality that will astound you.  Bass radiators enhance low frequency performance for more true-to-life sound  The Secret to Its Big SoundCompeting center channel speakers of this size usually have weak lower-midrange response; that part of the audio range that contains the "warmth" and "body" of voices and musical instruments. Listen to a male vocal on typical small satellite speakers and you will instantly hear the weakness in the lower midrange. The ProCenter avoids this critical problem by pressure-coupling exclusive BDSS technology drivers to two equal-sized mid/bass radiators cleverly placed on the sides of the speaker. This technique doubles the lower-midrange/bass radiating area of the speaker without increasing the size of the enclosure. You’ll enjoy the kind of rich, warm and life-like sound quality that you thought was only possible with big, hard-to-place speakers. Center Channel MuscleAs much as 75% of a movie's soundtrack is played by the center channel loudspeaker making it arguably the most important speaker in a home theater system. It is the key to getting intelligible dialog and true-to-life sound effects. So we lavished extra attention on the ProCenter 1000. It features 2 of the same BDSS drivers as used in ProMonitor 800 satellites along with 2 mid/bass radiators on the sides of the enclosure, allowing it to play loud and clear with high tonal accuracy.Easy to Place, Easy to UseSmall enough to disappear in a room but beautiful when in plain view, the ProCenter 1000 can be mounted on a shelf or on top of a TV. Its built-in foot allows you to adjust the angle of the speaker in the vertical plane to aim the speaker at listener’s ear height. Or you can wall mount it using two optional ProMount 80 articulating wall mounts (sold separately).The SoundThe ProCenter 1000 is a revelation in terms of achieving incredible sound at an affordable price. It fulfills with aplomb its most important job of delivering perfectly clear and intelligible dialog to every listener in the room. It dishes out high impact sound effects with distortion-free dynamics but is also capable of great subtlety to excel equally with music or movies.Technical SpecificationsDimensions: 14.75 by 5 by 5 inches (W x H x D)Dimensions: 14.75 by 5 by 5 inches (W x H x D)Nominal impedance: 4 to 8 ohmsNominal impedance: 4 to 8 ohmsFrequency response: 47 Hz to 30 kHzFrequency response: 47 Hz to 30 kHzRecommended amplification: 10 to 200 wattsRecommended amplification: 10 to 200 wattsEfficiency: 90 dBEfficiency: 90 dBDriver complement: 2 x 4.5" bass/midrange drivers; 2 x 4.5" planar low-frequency radiators; 1 x 1" aluminum dome tweeterDriver complement: 2 x 4.5" bass/midrange drivers; 2 x 4.5" planar low-frequency radiators; 1 x 1" aluminum dome tweeterMagnetic shielding: YesMagnetic shielding: YesFinish: Gloss blackFinish: Gloss black

Why there is no sound from soundbar after plugging into the HDMI port? 
1. Please ensure the port you plug into your TV is HDMI (ARC) and not HDMI. 
2. Please make sure it is Output Ports. Make sure the TV ports is HDMI(ARC) Output Port. If you plug in the input port from TV, there will be no sound from the sound bar. 
Why don't I get audio from all sources (Netflix, Amazon prime, Apple TV, etc)? 
In order to resolve this, you will need to ensure the TV's audio settings are set to two channel stereo/PCM output. And then please turn off DOLBY and/or DTS function in the app sound settings. 
Is this one soundbar and two speakers? 
No. The package will arrive as 2 separate tower speakers. You can connect these 2 speakers to make a regular 32" long soundbar.

modules.text: Indulge in a mesmerizing 3D home theater experience from the comfort of your own home with our 32-inch audio soundbar. With built-in DSP and 10 sound effects, our compact and slim soundbar creates an immersive cinematic experience that will transport you to another world.

modules.title: Sound bars for TV with Buit-in Dual Subwoofers
modules.text: This upgraded 2.2 channel soundbar with (4) includes two sub-woofers (producing deeper bass), two full range tweeters (providing clearer highs), two more than ordinary 2.0 TV speakers. It will bring you an unprecedented stereo audio experience.

items.title: Built-in DSP with 10 sound effects
items.text: With DSP technology, which brings impressive clarity and precision, let you enjoy all the details of CLASS/ROCK/POP/JAZZ/LINE/CLUB/DRAM/HALL/SOFT/FLAB.

items.title: 360° 3D Surround Sound Stereo Setup
items.text: Room Filling Audio Performance, Brings rich and clear 3D surround sound!

items.name: Bluetooth 5.0 Connection
items.text: Wirelessly stream all of your favorite music services, thanks to the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology

items.name: Universal Compatibility
items.text: HDMI ARC, Optical, RCA, and AUX connectivity ensures compatibility, make it the perfect for your TV.

items.name: USB Drive Connection
items.text: Equipped with a unique USB port. plug it in and connect it to your USB drive and it's good to go.

items.title: Use it like 2 small tower soundbars
Jointed together place on the top of desk

items.name: Why there is no sound from soundbar after plugging into the HDMI port?
items.text: 1. Please ensure the port you plug into your TV is HDMI (ARC) and not HDMI.   2. Please make sure it is Output Ports. Make sure the TV ports is HDMI(ARC) Output Port. If you plug in the input port from TV, there will be no sound from the sound bar.

items.name: Why don't I get audio from all sources (Netflix, Amazon prime, Apple TV, etc)?
items.text: In order to resolve this, you will need to ensure the TV's audio settings are set to two channel stereo/PCM output. And then please turn off DOLBY and/or DTS function in the app sound settings.

items.name: Is this one soundbar and two speakers?
items.text: No. The package will arrive as 2 separate tower speakers. You can connect these 2 speakers to make a regular 32" long soundbar.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers appreciate the sound quality, ease of setup, and value for money of the speakers. They find the sound satisfying with depth, delivered through six well-engineered speakers. Many consider it an excellent value for the price. The build quality, cable included, and design are also praised. However, opinions differ on connectivity.

title: ULTIMEA 2.2ch Sound Bar for Smart TV, Peak Power 100W, 2-in-1 Detachable Soundbar for TV, Bluetooth 5.3 TV Sound Bar, 3 EQ Modes, Bass Adjustable, HDMI ARC/Optical/Aux/Wall Mount, Apollo S40
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: Versatile and Space-Saving Shape - This soundbar's detachable design allows you to assemble it in a variety of styles to fit the layout and atmosphere of your room. The split design saves space while the unique 7° tilt design enriches the soundstage with exclusive details.

Louder and Richer Sound - Featuring built-in 2 tweeters and woofers, this 2.2ch sound bar for TV reproduces a balanced sound enjoys richer lows, and indulges in crisper highs. Additionally, it has an extra subwoofer interface that allows you to connect an external active subwoofer (subwoofer not included).

Personalized Sound Experience - Elevate your audio with 3 EQ modes designed for music, movies, and games. Ultimea exclusive BassMX technology enriches the low frequencies, enabling adjustable bass for a rumble, pulse-pounding Bass. All of these modes are easily accessible with a touch of a button on the EQ settings.
Fuller and Clearer Sound - This soundbar for tv utilizes an upgraded DSP chip to reduce audio static. This ensures that every word and sound is heard exactly as intended.

Seamless Connectivity - This sound bar for smart tv has wired and wireless dual connection options, including ARC, Optical, AUX, and USB ports (all cables included). Bluetooth 5.3 technology ensures faster speeds and a coverage range of up to 49 feet.
Simplified Control - With CEC synchronization, you can simultaneously control your TV and sound bar under an ARC connection. One-click power/volume switching reduces the need for multiple remotes.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Model: A39PRO | Color: Black 
The Clear Stereo Sound Computer Speakers for your Computer,PC,Laptop when enjoy music and movies . 
Warm tips: 
Q1:How to use the computer speaker? 
A1:There are 2 cable with the A39PRO computer speaker, USB is for power, 3.5 aux plus is for audio. 
Q2:How to turn on or turn off speaker and light? 
A2:There is a block switch on the back of the PC speaker to control the statue. 
LED position: Both LED and Speaker ON, 
ON Position :LED OFF Speaker on, 
OFF position： Both LED and Speaker off. 
Q3: How long are the speaker cables? 
A3: The USB and 3.5mm audio cables Both are 51 inches(1.3 meter). 
Q4:What is the wattage of these speakers? 
A4:The speaker is 10W,it is 2x5W dual drivers stereo sound speaker. 
Q5: Is the speaker can used for TVs ? 
A5:Not suggest, usually the PLUGs can't compatible with each other. 
How to adjust the volume easily? 
1.Set the volume up to about 85% on the your laptop or monitor. 
2.Adjust the volume up to 100% of the multimedia player is playing. 
3.Rotate the knob on the top of the speaker to adjust the volume when you need . 
NOTE: Please check whether your device equiped with the 3.5mm headphone port, If not, an extra adapter needed (NOT INCLUDED).

title: Bose Smart Soundbar 700: Premium Bluetooth Soundbar with Alexa Voice Control Built-in, Black
inStockText: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Featuring an unmatched combination of sophisticated design and exceptional sound the Bose sound bar 700 brings the full power of all your entertainment to life. Customized drivers pump out clear, spacious sound and rich bass that breathe new life into everything from alien invasions and car chases to house-rocking playlists. Plus, adapt audio room calibration optimizes the sound bar's acoustic performance the unique characteristics of your room - giving you the best possible listening experience. Plus, a tempered Glass top, wrap around metal grille, and clean lines, make the sound bar look as good as it sounds. With built-in voice assistants, like Alexa and the Google assistant, you can control your music, get information, access smart home control, and more — hands free. Just behind the grille is a custom-designed eight-microphone array for superior voice pickup, so your voice assistant will still hear you, even when the music is playing loud. Use the Bose music app to control all of your music and the Bose sound bar universal remote to manage all of your entertainment. Plus, with Bluetooth, Wi-Fi and Apple airplay 2 compatibility, you can play What you want, wherever you want, from any device in your home. The Bose Sound bar 700 is part of a family of Bose smart speakers and sound bars designed to be compatible with each other so you can enjoy more music in more rooms. And when you want to dial up the performance of your sound bar, just add the optional Bose bass Module 700 and Bose Surround Speakers at any time for thunderous bass and full-on surround sound. Leave the sound bar on the TV stand or mount it on the wall using the optional Bose sound bar Wall bracket. Included: Bose sound bar 700, Bose sound bar Universal remote, batteries, power cord, HDMI cable and optical cable are included with purchase. Make or take calls: With Alexa only, make or take calls from this smart soundbar to Bose smart products, Amazon Echo products, and anyone in your contacts list. Hands free, phone free, and free of charge.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Bose Soundbar 700 
Movie night. Every night. 
Lately, you might find yourself spending more time streaming shows or movies. So, let’s turn your everyday living room into a home theater. The Bose Soundbar 700 provides the most premium sound from Bose and has Amazon Alexa and the Google Assistant built in. 
No other soundbar gives you more. 
Featuring a tempered-glass top, wraparound metal grille, and clean lines, the Bose Soundbar 700 is meant to accentuate your room's decor. But the real beauty is the power beneath the exterior. Custom drivers and proprietary technologies deliver clear, spacious sound, so not only does this soundbar turn heads, it brings new life to all of your entertainment. 
Previous page
Make or take calls 
Using Alexa only, you can call Bose smart products, Amazon Echo products, and anyone in your contact list. To call products, both parties must set up this feature and be on Wi-Fi. 
A Few Icebreakers... 
Alexa, play Sam Fisher. Alexa, volume up. 
Alexa, turn on the TV. Alexa, watch NFL network. Alexa, call mom. 
Alexa, what's the weather? Alexa, set a timer for 5 minutes 
Watch TV, hands free. 
In addition to your smart soundbar, Bose Voice4Video expands your Alexa control to your TV and cable or satellite box. One simple voice command lets you start watching instantly. 
Quiet for them. Loud for you. 
Bose SimpleSync groups your Bose Soundbar 500 or 700 to your Bose Headphones 700. With independent volume controls, one of you can sleep as the other continues watching — guilt free. 
Music. Any way you want it. 
With Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and Apple AirPlay 2 compatibility, play your favorite music services, like Spotify, Amazon Music, or Apple Music, or play anything from your phone or tablet. 
Next page
Want to kick it up a notch? Add more. 
The Bose Soundbar 700 is built to be the only soundbar you need. But if you want more room-rocking bass, add the Bose Bass Module 700. Want to be in the center of the action? Add the Bose Surround Speakers for true surround sound. 
Meet the Family 
The Soundbar 700 is part of the new family of Bose smart speakers, which includes the Bose Home Speaker 300, the Bose Home Speaker 500, the Bose Portable Home Speaker, and the Bose Soundbar 500. Because nothing makes a home feel homier than every room filled with astonishing Bose sound.

modules.title: Movie night. Every night.
modules.subtitle: Bose Soundbar 700
modules.text: Lately, you might find yourself spending more time streaming shows or movies. So, let’s turn your everyday living room into a home theater. The Bose Soundbar 700 provides the most premium sound from Bose and has Amazon Alexa and the Google Assistant built in.

items.text:
Sounds good, anywhere.
ADAPTiQ audio room calibration will optimize the soundbar's acoustic performance to fit the unique characteristics of your room.

Elegant lightbar
Not sure Alexa or your Google Assistant heard you? An elegant light bar helps indicate when your voice assistant is listening, thinking, or speaking.

Clear voice pickup
A custom-designed eight-microphone array delivers superior voice pickup, so Alexa or your Google Assistant will still hear you even when the music is playing loud.

QuietPort technology
Recessed ports use a piece of resistant screen to reduce turbulent noise while getting more sound through a smaller opening for virtually distortion-free bass.

PhaseGuide technology
Proprietary PhaseGuide technology works with tiny transducers to direct beams of multi-directional sound, delivering an unprecedented level of spaciousness.

Proprietary drivers
Proprietary PhaseGuide technology works with tiny transducers to direct beams of multi-directional sound, delivering an unprecedented level of spaciousness.

title: TCL Alto 8 Plus 3.1.2 Channel Dolby Atmos Smart Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer, WiFi, Works w/ Alexa, Google Assistant & Apple Airplay 2, Bluetooth – TS8132, 39-inch, Black
inStockText: In Stock  Only 3 left in stock - order soon.

description: The TCL Alto 8 Plus lets you enjoy powerful, cinema-quality sound at home. Make all your entertainment more dynamic with Dolby Atmos technology, bringing multi-dimensional sound that moves around you for greater depth and excitement. No less than eight powerful drivers create a seriously powerful soundstage that will envelop you in sound—even from above—to give you cinema-like sound without additional components. Listen to clear dialogue with the dedicated center channel that’s been tuned for clarity, so you’ll always be part of the conversation. Experience deep, rich bass to make movies and music truly come to life. Feel the beats in music and the impact of an action scene in movies. Sleek, compact, and wireless, you can place the subwoofer virtually anywhere to adjust your exposure to huge, pulse-pounding bass.
features: DOLBY ATMOS SURROUND SOUND TECHNOLOGY: Dolby Atmos technology brings multi-dimensional sound that moves around you for greater depth and excitement, so you’re able to enjoy a more cinematic experience.

POWERFUL DRIVERS: No less than eight powerful drivers create a seriously powerful soundstage that will envelop you in sound—even from above—to give you cinema-like sound without additional components.
ROKU TV READY: Enjoy smoother setup, easy access to sound settings, and compatibility with your TCL Roku TV remote.

WIRELESS SUBWOOFER FOR PULSE-POUNDING BASS: Experience deep, rich bass to make movies and music truly come to life. Feel the beats in music and the impact of an action scene in movies. Sleek, compact, and wireless, you can place the subwoofer virtually anywhere to adjust your exposure to bass.

WIRELESS MUSIC STREAMING WITH BLUETOOTH: Stream all your favorite music and podcasts from apps like Pandora, Spotify, TuneIn, and more, wirelessly from your smartphone, tablet, or laptop with Bluetooth wireless technology.
CENTER CHANNEL FOR CLEAR DIALOGUE: Enjoy clearer dialogue from the dedicated center channel, tuned for optimal clarity so you’ll always be part of the conversation.
EASY VOICE CONTROL: Just say the word using a compatible device (sold separately) to play and control music hands-free. Works with Alexa, Siri and Hey Google.

STREAM MUSIC WIRELESSLY WITH BLUETOOTH - Stream all your favorite music and podcasts from apps like Pandora, Spotify, TuneIn, and more, wirelessly from your smartphone, tablet, or laptop with Bluetooth 5.0 wireless technology.
STREAM IN PERFECT HARMONY: Stream music from your favorite device using Apple Airplay 2, Google Assistant, or Alexa.

I only receive 2 small speakers, is the real soundbar missing? Where is the sound bar? 
No. Those 2 small "speakers" as you mentioned are actually 2 soundbars, which could be combined into 1 large soundbar or you could insert them separately to the bases. 
Is there any deep bass? or subwoofer included or any connector to hook up a subwoofer? 
No subwoofer/DEEP BASS. This soundbar focus on people need loud and stereo sound with limited budgets. If you have special needs for DEEP BASS, please skip this product. 
Why does streaming sound static? Does it support Netflix or Amazon Prime video? 
Please switch the sound setting to STEREO output when you use streaming. (in app setting such as Netflix or TV setting) 
Why is there no sound? Why does the sound occasionally sound terrible? 
Note: Please set your TV sound setting to PCM mode - Different TV have different sound setting, please provide TV model to us for specific setting process according to your TV model.

title: Wohome 2.1 Sound Bar for Smart TV with 5 Inches Subwoofer, 140W, 2 in 1 Detachable Soundbar with RGB-IC Backlight, Bluetooth 5.3, Optical, AUX, USB Input, Bass Adjustable, Remote/Button Control
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: Deep and Powerful Bass: Featuring a 5-inch subwoofer, this system delivers rich, immersive bass that adds depth to your audio experience. Designed with both performance and aesthetics in mind, the compact and stylish subwoofer blends seamlessly into your space without obstructing your view. With 7 adjustable bass levels, you can easily tailor the sound to your specific preferences, making it suitable for all your entertainment needs.

Powerful 140W Peak Output: With a peak power of 140W, this system delivers loud, room-filling sound that’s perfect for any space—whether it’s a living room, bedroom, or home theater. Enjoy clear, robust audio for all types of media and entertainment.

RGB-IC Atmosphere Lighting: Equipped with advanced chip-level voice recognition, the lights sync with the rhythm of your music, creating dynamic visuals perfect for parties and gatherings. The static mode offers pure color lighting, ideal as a background light to reduce eye strain from TV glare in dark environments. Easily switch the ambient light on or off to suit your mood and setting.

Seamless Connectivity: Bluetooth 5.3 ensures a faster, more stable wireless connection with all your Bluetooth devices. Optical and AUX inputs offer reliable audio connections for both new and older TVs. The USB port supports U disk playback and software updates.

Built-in DSP with 3 Sound Modes: The advanced DSP technology ensures stable, high-quality sound performance. Choose from three preset sound modes to suit your preferences: Music mode offers balanced sound, Movie mode enhances bass for a cinematic experience, and News mode delivers crystal-clear vocals.

Versatile Detachable Design: Choose between two installation options: the single-strip mode for easy setup, or the split mode for a more immersive surround sound experience. Customize your setup to match your space and audio preferences.

Why is the subwoofer not working? 
Please use DJ songs to test it. At this time, you can clearly feel the vibration of the subwoofer by touching it with your hand. Remember to adjust the EQ to EQ1 music mode to test it. 
Can I use it with my headphones? 
No, it is not compatible with headphones. 
How do I use TV remote to control the soundbar? 
The sound bar do not support third-party remote. For some TV, use AUX cable to connect the sound bar, and you can use the TV remote to control the volume. 
It dose not work or no sound. 
Please follow the Setup Tips or Manual to install it step by step, if this issue can not be fixed, please send email to us, we will help to deal with it without 24 hours. 
Why does the sound still seem very low even when both the audio source and sound bar are turned up to maximum volume? 
Please first check whether the sound source has volume protection set. You need to disable the volume protection function to reach the maximum volume.

title: [Upgraded] Computer Speakers for Desktop PC | Monitor Speakers | USB Plug-N-play External Speakers for Laptop, Small PC Soundbar with HD Sound, Loud Volume, Enhanced Bass – Easily Clamps to Monitors
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Accessories & Peripherals › Audio & Video Accessories › Computer Speakers
features: INCREDIBLE LOUD SOUND WITH DEEP BASS: The desktop computer speaker features dual super-magnetic drivers and a passive radiator, ensuring the delivery of hi-quality stereo sound with loud volume and deep bass from such a small body.

EASILY CLIP-ON, SAVING DESKTOP SPACE: The monitor speakers can be quickly and easily clamped to the top, side or bottom of the monitors ranging from 0.1-inch to 1-inch in thickness, which effectively saves your desktop space. And of course, the patented clamp also allows the speaker to be placed smoothly on your desktop.

USB PLUG-N-PLAY, VERY EASY TO USE: No need for 3.5mm headphone cable and driver software, only the single USB cable can feed both audio and electric power to the PC speakers, which greatly help avoid messy cables.

FULL COMPATIBILITY: Proven by millions of users of our USB speakers, this enhanced computer sound bar would be a great external speaker for Windows/macOS/Chrome OS/Linux PC, laptop and desktop computers.

NO EXTRA BUTTONS NEEDED: This USB plug-in speakers do not have any volume control buttons, you can simply adjust the volume on your computer system without needing to adjust both system volume and speaker volume like other computer speakers.

[Monitor] Computer Speakers for Desktop PC Laptop 
Key Features 
>Features dual ultra-magnetic drivers for crystal-clear loud sound. 
>Enhanced bass with front-facing passive radiator. 
>Easily Clamp to the monitors ranging from 0.1inch to 1.0inch in thickness. 
>Won’t block the camera in most cases when clip to laptop monitor. 
>Compatible with Windows PC and desktop computer. 
>Compatible with macOS and Chrome OS laptops. 
>USB plug-n-play, very easy to use. 
Package List 
1 x Computer Speakers 
1 x User Manual 
Incredible Loud Sound with Deep Bass 
Features dual super-magnetic drivers and a passive radiator, ensuring the delivery of hi-quality stereo sound with loud volume and deep bass from such a small body. 
Specifications 
>Sound Channel: 2.0 Stereo 
>Rated Power: 6Watt (2*3Watt) 
>Maximum Power: 8Watt (2*4Watt) 
>Speaker Type: Ultra-Magnetic Drivers 
>Speaker Size: 1.6 inch 
>Bass Enhancement: Passive Radiator 
>Frequency Response: 100Hz - 20kHz 
Easily Clamp to Most of the Monitors 
The monitor speakers can be quickly and easily clamped it to the top, side or bottom of the monitors ranging from 0.1-inch to 1-inch in thickness, which effectively saves your desktop space. 
And of course, the patented clamp also allows the speaker to be placed smoothly on your desktop. 
>Acceptable thickness of monitor: 0.1inch~1.0inch / (2.5mm~25mm) 
USB Plug-N-Play, Very Easy to Use 
No need for 3.5mm headphone cable and driver software, only the single USB cable can feed both audio and electric power to the PC speakers, which greatly help avoid messy cables. 
>Length of USB cable: 4.4Ft 
Note 
The camera won't be blocked in most cases when you clip our speaker to the top of the laptop monitor. 
Fully Compatible with PC, Laptop and Desktop Computers 
Proven by millions of users of our USB speakers, this enhanced computer sound bar would be a great external speaker for Windows/macOS/Chrome OS/Linux PC, laptop and desktop computers. 
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) 
Q: Is it compatible with TV/TV-Box/Projector/Monitor/Xbox/PStation/iPad/tablets? 
A: No. This USB speaker can only be used for computers. The reason for this is that the USB ports on other devices may not provide sufficient electric power to drive our speaker, resulting in a reduced maximum volume level. 
Q: Is it okay if I connect it to a USB hub? 
A: The USB-hub is not recommended as it may not provide enough power to drive our speaker, resulting in potential audio issues such as distortion, cluttered sound, or even constant pops (audio cut-out) when played at high volume. 
Q: Is there a mic built-in? 
A: The device does not have a built-in microphone, so it is recommended to use an external computer microphone for video calls. 
Q: How to adjust speaker volume? 
A: You can simply adjust the volume on your computer system. 
Q: Can this speaker be used without attaching to monitor? 
A: Yes of course, the clamp also allows the speaker to be placed smoothly on your desk.
